column2: Barcelona yemeje ko Xavi Hernandez yagarutse nk'umumenyereza
column3: Uwahoze akina hagati muri Barcelona Xavi Hernandez yagarutse muri uyu murwi wo muri Espagne nk'umumenyereza mu masezerano yo gushika mu 2024. Uyu munya Espagne w'imyaka 41 yahora amenyereza umurwi Al Sadd  wo muri Qatar kuva mu 2019, ariko ejo ku wa gatanu uyu murwi waremeye kumurekura kugira agende muri Barcelona inyuma y'aho iyi mirwi ishikiye ku masezerano. Barcelona ivuga ko aya masezerano azotangurana n'igice gisigaye c'umwaka w'inkino 2021-22 abandanye mu yindi myaka ibiri izokurikira. Yitezwe muri Espagne muri iyi misi y'impera z'iyi ndwi, akaba yiteze kwerekanwa ku mugaragaro i Nou Camp ku wa mbere. Mw'ireresi yarungikiye abafana, uyu yahoze ari umukinyi yafashije igihugu ciwe gutahukana igikombe c'isi yose mu 2010 hamwe n'ibikombe vya Bulaya incuro zibiri yavuze ati: "Si nari nasezeye burundu, nari navuze nti 'tuzosubira vuba'.  Nou Camp hamye ari muhira kuri jewe". "Muri abafana banje, abantu banje, uyu murwi nkunda cane. Ubu rero ndagarutse muhira. Vuba turi kumwe bagenzi.  Forca Barca." Inyuma y'inkino 767 agatsindira ibikombe 25 mu myaka 17 yose yamaze muri Barcelona, Xavi yasezeye uyu murwi mu 2015 aja muri Al Sadd, aho yashikiye ubwa mbere nk'umukinyi. Yahavuye aba umumenyereza wayo mu 2019 inyuma y'aho akukurukiye nk'umukinyi, akaba yarawufashije mu mwaka w'inkino uheze gutahukana igikombe c'ihiganwa. Mu nkino 36 zose Al Sadd ntirigera itsindwa. Kuva Barcelona yirukanye Ronald Koeman ku wa 27 z'ukwa cumi, Xavi yaravuzwe cane ko yashobora gusubira i Nou Camp ari na ho yamaze igihe kinini cane mu mwuga wiwe w'umupira w'amaguru. Barcelona ubu iza mu kibanza c'icenda mw'ihiganwa La Liga  rya Espagne, imaze gutsinda inkino zine gusa mu nkino cumi na rumwe za mbere imaze gukina, ikaba isumbwa na Real Sociedad iza mu kibanza ca mbere amanota icenda yose. Uyu murwi wo mu ntara ya Catalonia ihanganye n'ikibazo c'ubukene bw'amafaranga, mbere ukaba waranananiwe no kugumana umukinyi rurangiranwa yahoze akinana na Xavi, Lionel Messi, kubera ikibazo c'umushahara wiwe. Barcelona yarananiwe no gusohora ayandi mafaranga kugira ngo igure abandi bakinyi mu ci riheze, ikaba yaronse Memphis Depay, Sergio Aguero na Eric Garcia kuri gusa, hanyuma umusatirizi Luuk de Jong nawe akinjira avuye muri Sevilla nk'intizo. Imbere y'umuzo wa Xavi, umukuru wa Barcelona Joan Laporta yigeze kuvuga ati: "Namye ndabivuga kuva kera ko impera n'imperuka (Xavi)  azoba umumenyereza wa Barcelona, ariko sinzi igihe".

column2: Ukraine: Putin yategetse ingabo kubandanya zisatira inyuma yo gufata Lysychansk
column3: Perezida Vladimir Putin w’Uburusiya yategetse umushikiranganji wiwe wo kwivuna abansi kubandanya basatira Ukraine inyuma y’aho ingabo z’ico gihugu zigaruriye igisagara ca Lysychansk. Perezida Putin yerekanywe ku mboneshakure y’Uburusiya atera akamo ingabo ziri hakurya kubandanya intumbero yazo nk’uko biri “mu nteguro zamaze kwemezwa”. Ifatwa rya Lysychansk risigura ko ubu intara ya Luhansk yose iri mu minwe y’Uburusiya. Mu ntango buramatari w’umunya-Ukraine yavuze ko iki gisagara bakivuyemwo kugira ngo Abarusiya ntibagisambure bibereye kure. Abasirikare ubu bagiye ku bindi birindiro bishasha vyakomejwe, nk’uko buramatari Serhiy Haidai yabibwiye BBC. Avuga ko guhebera Abarusiya iki gisagara n’intara ya Luhansk cabaye ikintu kibabaje, ariko akongerako ati: “Iyi ni intambara imwe gusa dutakaje, nti dutakaje urugamba”. Yasavye ibindi birwanisho biva mu Burengero kugira ngo bashobore guhangana n’inguvu z’Uburusiya. Perezida Volodymyr Zelensky arizeza ko ingabo za Ukraine zizosubirayo kugira zisubize Lysychansk "kubera ibirwanisho bigezweho biriko birongerezwa”. Uburusiya bwarongereje inguvu mu bitero vy’amabombe mu bisagara vyegereye akarere ka Donbas, aho uduce turi mu micungararo ya Sloviansk n’ibarabara riri hagati ya Lysychansk na Bakhmut ari two twiziziwe, nk’uko ingabo za Ukraine zibivuga. Intara za Donetsk na Luhansk zose hamwe nizo zigize akarere k’amahinguriro ka Donbas. Perezida Putin yabonetse abwira umushikiranganji wo kwivuna abansi  Sergei Shoigu ko ingabo zagize uruhara mw’ifatwa rya Luhansk zikwiye “kuruhuka kugira ngo zitegurire urundi rugamba”. Avuga ati: "Iyindi mirwi y’ingabo, harimwo umurwi wo mu Buseruko n’umurwi wo mu Burengero, itegerezwa kurangura imirimo yayo hakurikijwe integuro zamaze kwemezwa”. Yizeye kandi ko no kuri izo mpande zindi bazoshika ku ntambwe nk’iyatewe mu ntara ya Luhansk. Imbere gato y’uko atanguza igitero kuri Ukraine ku wa 24 Ruhuhuma (2), Putin yari yemeje Luhansk na Donetsk nk’ibihugu vyigenga. Inyeshamba zegamiye Uburusiya zatanguje intambara muri ako karere mu 2014 - umwaka nyene Uburusiya bwigarurira akarere ka Crimea. Haraciye indwi irenga ingabo z’Uburusiya zigaruriye Severodonetsk – igisagara cabaye umunyota kubera ibibombe vy’Uburusiya. Avuga ku ngingo yo kuva muri Lysychansk, Haidai yavuze ati: "Igisirikare cacu kiba caragumije iki gisagara igihe kirekire, ariko ingabo z’Uburusiya ubu zifise amahirwe menshi ku birwanisho vya rutura n’amasasu. Zari gusambura iki gisagara zibereye kure, rero ntaco vyari bimaze kugumayo”. Haidai avuga ko ubu ingabo zimukiye ku birindiro biri mu ntara ya Donetsk ihana urubibe na Luhansk, ariko ko abantu 10.000 bakiri muri iki gisagara.

column2: OMS yihagazeko ku miti y'inkorora "ibangamye" ikorerwa muri India
column3: OMS ivuga ko n'ubu igihagaze hahandi nyene   inyuma y'aho Ubuhindi buvugiye ko imiti ine y'inkorora ifitaniye isano n'impfu z'abana muri Gambia yujuje ibisabwa igihe yapimwa muri ico gihugu. OMS yari yasohoye  imburi mu kwezi kwa Gitugutu  (10) igira inama abacungera ibijanye n'imiti kudasubira kugurisha iyo miti inyobwa (Sirop/syrup) ikorwa na kompanyi yo mu Buhindi. Umutegetsi wo muri reta y'Ubuhindi yabwiye BBC ko OMS "yahurudutse" mu kwagiriza iyo miti. Ariko iryo shami rya ONU riraba amagara kw'isi ryavuze ko ryakoze ico rijejwe. Umutegetsi wo muri OMS yabwiye BBC kuri email ati: "Inshingano za OMS n'ukuburira isi ku bishobora kubangama. OMS ihagaze ku co yakoze." OMS yongeyeko ko izo "sirop zibangamye kandi zidakwiye kuba mu muti n'umwe, na gato. Mu mpera z'ukwezi kwa Mukakaro (kw'indwi) abategetsi muri Gambia babonye ko hari ukwiyongera mu gukomereka amafvyigo mu bana bafise munsi y'imyaka itanu. Reta mu nyuma yavuze ko abana 69 bapfuye  biturutse kuri izo ngorane ku mafyigo. Mu kwezi kwa Gitugutu (10) , OMS yavuze ko izo mpfu zishobnora kuba zifitaniye isano n'imiti y'inkorora inyobwa ine  ikorwa na Maiden Pharmaceuticals, kompanyi yo mu Buhindi. OMS ivuga ko yapimye iyo miti - romethazine Oral Solution, Kofexmalin Baby Cough Syrup, Makoff Baby Cough Syrup na  Magrip N Cold Syrup - hanyuma igasanga yarimwo urugero rutemewe rwa diethylene glycol  na  ethylene glycol nk'ibihumanya". Diethylene glycol na ethylene glycol ni ubumara ku muntu kandi ishobora kwica umuntu ayifashe. \n\nUbuhidi bwaciye buvuga ko bugiye gutohoza kuri iyi miti buca butegeka Maiden Pharmaceuticals guhagarika kuyikora mw'ihinguriro ryayo rikuru riri mu ntara ya Haryana iri mu buraruko. Ku wa  13 Kigarama (12), Muganga  VG Somani, umugenduzi mukuru w'imiti mu Buhindi, yandikiye ikete OMS avuga ko ibipimo vyakozwe kur iyo miti muri laboratoire ya reta  vyerekanye ko iyo miti "itari ihumanijwe" n'ivyo OMS yavuze. Yongeyeko ati: "Dukurkije ivyegeranyo vya laboratoire ya reta , ibipimo vyo gusuzuma kuri iyo miti yose uko ari ine vyatoye ko yari yujuje ibisabwa ." Ivyerekanywe n'ibimo biriko birihwezwa kandi n'umugwi w'abahinga b'Abahindi. Umujenama mukuru mu bushikiranganji bw'Ubuhindi bujejwe amakuru yabwiye BBC ko OMS "yahurudutse" mu kwagiriza ko iyo miti y'inkorora ko ariyo yateye impfu  z'abana. Kanchan Gupta yavuze ko OMS yihuse kwemeza ibintu ata vyemeza vy'ubuhinga ifise. Yoyo (OMS), ivuga ko "iyo abana bapfuye ku bwinshi bitewe n'indwara y'amayobera, kaba ari akaga bisigura ko OMS itegerezwa gufata ingingo  yihuta". OMS ivuga ko "Laboratoire zatumwe na OMS muri Ghana no muri Suisse zapimye izo sirop ziketswe muri Gambia hanyuma ziremeza ko harimwo urugero rurengeje rwa  ethylene glycol na  diethylene glycol," ikabandanya ivuga ko buno nyene yaciye imenyesha ivyavuyemwo abategetsi bo muri Gambia n'Ubuhindi, yongera ibimenyesha abategetsi ba Maiden Pharmaceutical. Mw'ikete ryiwe, Muganga  Somani avuga ko uwo mugwi w'abahinga wasavye OMS  izindi nkuru zihariye zifasha kwemeza ko iyo miti ishobora kurwaza ariko ko gushika ubu utarayabwa. Iryo kete ntiryavuga neza neza ico uwo mugwi wasaba ico ari co. BBC irondeye ibiro vya Muganga  Somani, vyayibwiye kubariza mu bushikirnganji bw'Ubuhindi bujejwe amagara. BBC yabwandikiye ngo bugire ico buvuze. Ubuhindi buhingura ica gatatu c'imiti yo kw'isi, cane cane mu buryo bwa "generique". Mu Buhindi niho habarizwa amwe mu mahinguriro  y'imiti atera imbere ku muvuduko mununi cane, ico gihugu ubu kikaba gifatwa nka "farumasi (pharmacie) y'isi" ,kandi  nico ahanini gikora imiti ikoreshwa muri Africa.

column2: Malawi: Ishavu kubera ikigongwe ku bategetsi bariye ibiturire
column3: Umushikirizamanza mukuru muri Malawi yagirijwe gukingira abanyaporitike bo muri ico gihugu inyuma yo gutangaza  ikigongwe ku bantu bivye reta  canke bariye ibiturire. Thabo Chakaka-Nyirenda  yavuze ko mu mezi abiri ari imbere umuntu wese azokwemera ko yivye canke yariye igiturire/ruswa atazojanwa mu bucamanza mu gihe azoba yasubije amafaranga yagirizwa. Ivyo bishitse um gihe ibiro vya Malawi bigwanya ibiturire biriko biragerageza gufata umushikiranganji ajejwe ubutaka, Kezzie Msukwa, kubera ubusuma buvugwamwo amafaranga aharurwa muri miriyoni z'amadorari  burimwo umugwizatunga w'umwongereza  aba muri Malawi, Zuneth Sattar. Abo bagabo bompi  bavuga ko ata caha bakoze. Umukuru w'ikigo ca Malawi ca Demokrasi n'iterambere ry'ubutunzi, Sylvester Namiwa, yavuze ko gutangaza ico kigongwe vyerekanye ko uwo mushikirizamanza mukuru yitesheje agaciro ka poritike aca amusaba gutanga imihoho. Amaze kubona ko ariko aranegurwa cane, uwo mushikirizamanza mukuru yahaye ikiganiro abamenyeshamakuru avuga ko ico kigongwe kitazoba cerekeye ibintu vyoze bijanye no kwiba canke n'ibiturire.

column2: Uwahoze ari Pope Benedict ntaco yakoze kw'ihohoterwa, biri mu cegeranyo gishasha
column3: Uwahoze ari Papa Benedicto XVI yarananiwe  no kugira ico akoze ku mabi yo guhohotera abana igihe yari akiri musenyeri mukuru i Munich , nk'uko bivugwa n'amatohoza yo mu Budagi ku bijanye na Ekereziya Katorika. Papa Benedicto, ico gihe yari azwi nka  Josef Ratzinger, yari muri ico kibanza hagati ya 1977 na 1982. Yarahakanye ko ivyo vyabaye. Ariko icegeranyo gishasha ku mabi avugwa ko yakozwe muri kahise cakozwe n'ikigo c'amategeko co mu Budagi kiragiriza uwo yahoze ari umwungere mukuru. Ihohoterwa ryarabandanije igihe yari musenyeri mukuru, nk'uko bivugwa, kandi abapatiri bagirizwa bagumye mu mabanga bari bafise mu masengero bakoramwo. Uwo yahoze ari papa, ubu afise imyaka 94, yabaye indongozi ya mbere ya Ekereziya yatanze imihoho (yeguye)  mu myaka irenga 600 mu 2013, avuga ko arushe. Kuva ico gihe, abayeho mu buzima buhwekereye i Vaticano aho azwi nka papa 'emerite'. Ico cegerenyo gishasha c'ico kigo c'amategeko co mu Budagi citwa Westpfahl Spilker Wastl  casabwe na Ekereziya Katorika. Umunyamategeko Martin Pusch  ashikiriza ico cegeranyo yavuze ati: "Habiri  muri aho vyabaye  vyakozwe  ku gihe ciwe hanyuma birenzwako amaso na reta." "Kuri vyompi, ababikoze bagumye bakora amabanga y'ubupatiri yo kwitaho abantu." Hari hamwe bivugwa ko yari azi umupatiri yagirizwa guhohotera abana b'abahungu yimuriwe muri diyoseze yiwe, ariko abandanya gukora amabanga yo kwitaho abakristu  - aho hakaba harimwo rimwe na rimwe kugendera no gushigikira  abantu mu kibano iwabo. Uwo yahoze ari Papa bivugwa ko yarungitse impapuro nyinshi z'inyishu ku bibazo vy'ico kigo, aho yerekanye ko ashigikiye iryo tohoza ariko agahakana kuba yarigeze amenya canke yanka kugira ico akoze kuri iryo hohoterwa rivugwa. Ico cegeranyo, yamara, kirimwo  inyandiko zisa n'izerekana bikomeye ko yari ari mu nama aho ico kibazo cavuzwe. Vaticano yavuze mw'itangazo ko izokwihweza ido n'ido ry'ico cegeranyo niyo camara gusohoka. Vaticano yongeyeko iti: "Nk'uko twongeye guterwa  isoni n'ukwicuza twatewe n'amabi yakorewe abana bakiri bato n'abapatiri, Icicaro Ceranda kirashikirije ko gishigikiye abahuye n'ayo mabi bose kandi kiremeza inzira yo gukingira abatarakura n'uko haba ibibanza vy'aho ata kibi bashobora gukorerwa". Icegeranyo caheruka ku mabi yakozwe muri kahise mu Budagi cerekanye ko abantu bashika 3.600 mu gihugu cose bari barakorewe amabi n'abantu bo mu mu nzego za ekereziya  hagati ya 1946 na 2014. Benshi mu bayakorewe bari abana bakiri bato kandi bakora nk'abahungu b'abakorezi kuri arutari. Ico cegeranyo gishasha cibanze ku turere twa Munich na Freising  catoye vyihariye ko nibura abantu 497 bakorewe ihohoterwa kuva mu 1945 gushika mu 2019. Uretse uwo yahoze ari papa, ico cegeranyo kiranegura abandi bantu bo muri  ekereziya, harimwo umusenyeri mukuru w'iyo ntara muri iki gihe, Cardinal Reinhard Marx. Abakoze amatohoza basanze nawe hari aho ataco yakoze ku hantu  habiri havugwa ihohoterwa. Uwo mu karidinari aramaze gusaba  Papa François gutanga imihoho mu kwezi kwa gatandatu mu 2011 avuga ko akwiye kwumva nawe hari ico yobazwa ku "kaga" k'ihohoterwa riguma rishirwa ahabona. Papa François ariko yaranse ubusabe bwiwe bwo gutanga imihoho. Imbere yaho, papa yari yahinduye amategeko ya Vaticano ajanye n'ivyaha, aho yakajije cane aho ekereziya ihagaze ku vyerekeye ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina.

column2: Uwahoze ari umuhuza w'Abarundi Sheikh Mohamed Rukara yaryamiye ukuboko kw'abagabo
column3: Umushingamateka Sheikh Mohamed Rukara yahoze ari umuhuza w'Abarundi yaraye aryamiye ukuboko kw'abagabo. Uyo mu nyapolitike yahoze ari umunywanyi akomeye w'umugambwe CNDD-FDD yapfiriye i Bruxelles mu gihugu c'u Bubirigi. Aciye ku rubuga rwiwe rwa Twitter, umukuru w'igihugu Petero Nkurunziza abuva ko Abarundi bazokwama iragi ry'urukundo n'ubumwe "vyamye bimuranga. Urupfu rwiwe ruravugwa cane ku mbuga hwaniro cane cane Twitter, aho abatari bake bamenyesha ko bababaye, banashimagiza ivyo yakoze. Selemani Bonke ati: "…ndamwibuka igihe yavuga ati 'Ujinga ni mzigo' (bivuga mu Kirundi ngo ubujuju ni umuzigo)". Bwana Rukara yavutse mu mwaka wa 1955, akaba yari mu banywanyi bakomeye b'umugambwe uri ku butegetsi CNDD-FDD, yigeze kuba no mu nama y'inararibonye zawo. Azwi ko yize amashure mu gihugu ca Arabia Saoudite, akaba yarabaye mu bihugu vya Costa Rica hamwe na Tanzania. Yaranakoze kw'iradiyo y'igihugu, aho yashikiriza amakuru mu rurimi rw'igi Swahili akaba ariwe yashinze radiyo na televiziyo Salama. Umuhisi Rukara yatowe mu mwaka wa 2010 kuba umuhuza w'Abarundi, ico gihe akaba yari umusenateri, aho yaciye atangura ayo mabanga mu ntango za 2011. Igikorwa ciwe nticari coroshe. Mu kwezi kwa gatanu 2012, amaze umwaka umwe urenga atanguye amabanga, yatangaje ko hari akarwi k'abantu bashaka kumugandagura, aho umuvugizi wiwe ico gihe, Jerome Ndiho, yavuze ko kari akarwi k'abiba ikigega c'igihugu. Umuhisi Rukara yagiye kurangiza amabanga yiwe nk'umuhuza w'Abarundi mu kwezi kwa cumi na rimwe umwaka wa 2016, akaba yasubiriwe na Edouard Nduwimana yahoze ari umushikiranganji w'intwaro yo hagati mu gihugu.

column2: South Africa: Hoba hagire haze umupfunda wa 5 wa Covid-19?
column3: Abandura Covid muri Afrika y'epfo ku munsi bariyongereye gushika ku rugero rwa 60% hagati yo kuwa gatatu no kuwa kane bigatera impungenge z'uko hoba hagire haze umupfunda ugira gatanu w'iyo ndwara muri ico gihugu. Haraharuwe abantu 9.757 bashasha banduye mu gihe kwandura no kwinjira ibitaro biriko biriyongera ku rugero ruri hejuru, nk'uko bitangazwa n'ikigo c'ico gihugu kijejwe indwara zandukira. Ubushikiranganji bujejwe amagara buvuga yuko ubwoko bubiri bwamuka kuri Omicron ari bwo buriko buratuma ibitigiri biduga, bikigaragaza mu ntara nini zitatu - Gauteng, Western Cape na KwaZulu-Natal. Bamwe mu bahinga b'indwara zandukira bavuga yuko bafatiye ku ruhande rw'ubuhinga, bovuga yuko Afrika y'epfo imaze gushikirwa n'umupfunda wa gatanu wa Covid, kandi bikaba bibaye kare kurusha uko vyategekanywa. Kuwa kane, ikigo c'igihugu kijejwe ivy'amagara, National Department of Health, congeye amezi atatu ku ngingo zimwe zo gukumira iyo ndwara; zirimwo kwambara agapfukamunwa mu mazu, kugabanya igitigiri c'abemerewe guhurira ahantu hamwe co kimwe n'ic'abinjira mu gihugu. Ico kigo cigije inyuma itariki ntarengwa yo gutangaza ingingo zivuguruwe zijanye n'ivy'amagara, kugira habe ukundi kuganira kwa bose nyuma y'ikurwako ry'ibihe bidasanzwe vy'ikiza bimaze imyaka ibiri kubera Covid. Abanye-Afrika y'epfo bari biteze kuja mu bihe vy'ukwisanzura nyuma y'ikurwako ry'amategeko adasanzwe, ariko leta iracariko iragerageza guhangana n'ubuzima busanzwe bushasha. Iki gihugu nico cashegeshwe cane na covid kurusha ibindi ku mugabane kandi cararanzwemo amategeko akomeye cane ajanye no gukumira ikiza. Ariko abajejwe intwaro barahanganye cane n'igitigiri c'abapfa, ubu kikaba kiri ku rugero rw'indwi mu masaha ari hagati ya 24 na 48 aheruka.

column2: Dolly Parton: ‘Nivyo, ubuzima bw’abirabure ni kirumara”
column3: Umunyamuziki rurangiranwa wo mu mudiho wa country music, Dolly Parton, nawe yifatanije n'abandi mu gushigikira isekeza Black Lives Matter (ubuzima bw'abirabure ni kirumara), mu gihe yariko ashikiriza aho ahagaze ku bijanye n'ubuzima bw'igihugu, ibidakunze kuba. Yabwiye ikinyamakuru c'utugenegene Billboard ati: "Mbega burya wibaza ko aba bazungu bacu ari bo bonyene bafise akamaro? Oya". Uyu muririmvyi aasanzwe afise  abakunzi mu mpande zose, asanzwe adakunda kugira ivyo avuga ku bijanye na politike. Aya majambo yiwe aje mu gihe igihugu cose kiri mu bihe bidasanzwe mu bijanye n'umubaho hagati y'abadasangiye ubwoko vyagize ingaruka mu bice vyose vy'ubuzima muri Amerika, harimwo na country music. N'aho umupfasoni Parton atashoboye kuja mu myiyerekano muri rya sekeza rya Blakc Lives Matter, avuga ko ashigikiye uburenganzira bw'abiyamiriza ivanguramoko rishingiye ku rukoba. Yabwiye ico kinyamakuru ati: "Ndatahura neza ko ari uburenganzira bw'abantu guserura akari ku mutima no kwumvirizwa". Urupfu rwa wa mwirabure George Floyd hamwe n'imyiyerekano yaciye ikurikira vyaragize ingaruka mbi mu bisata bitandukanye, haba mu nkino canke no mu muziki, ivyatumye abanyamuziki bamwe baja muri iyo myiyerekano, abandi nabo biba ngombwa ko basubiramwo bakihweza ibijanye n'imigenderanire yabo n'abandi badasangiye urukoba. Perezida Donald Trump wewe abona ukundi iyo myiyerekano, aho afata abari muri yo nk'abagumutsi, mbere yiyamiriza bikomeye abari bafashe ingingo yo gupfukama igihe ururirimbo rw'igihugu ruriko ruraririmbwa mu kwerekana akababaro kabo. Umupfasoni Parton yashikirije ayo majambo mu gihe imyiyamamazo mu matora y'umukuru w'igihugu yimirije yashushe, ingendo itandukanye n'iyo yari afise mu myaka ine iheze aho  yirinda cane kunegura Bwana Trump igihe yahiganwa na Hillary Clinton. Eka no mu 2017 yashimye kutagira ico avuze mu gihe we na bagenziwe Emmys, Lily Tomlin na Jane Fonda bari mu giteramo, aho aba bandi bobo bafashe akanya ko kwiyamiriza Perezida Trump. Ubu bwa vuba naho ati: "None nimba wanka urunuka umukuru w'igihugu, kubera iki tutomusengera?" Sibwo bwa mbere uyu muririmvyi w'imyaka 74 - aboneka nk'umwe mu bashigikiye abagore bagendera ku vyiyumviro bikaze vy'ukwigenga (feministes) akaba kandi anashigikiye abahuza ibitsina babisangiye - ashigikira abipfuza ko ibintu bihinduka. Mu 2014, yarashigikiye abubakana badahuje ibitsina, umwaka umwe imbere y'uko itegeko ribirekura mu gihugu cose. Hagati aho, ariyubara cane muvyo ashikiriza mu ntumbero yo kwirinda uko bishoboka kugira uwo ababaje, akenshi akama ahanura abantu "kwirinda gucira abandi imanza kugira ngo nabo ntibahave bacirwa izindi".

column2: C﻿ristiano Ronaldo: Manchester United yafashe ivyemezo nyuma y'ikiganiro mu binyamakuru
column3: Ubuyobozi bwa Manchester United buvuga yuko buriko burafata “ingingo zibereye” nyuma y’aho Cristian Ronaldo atangiye ikiganiro akavuga yuko “yagambaniwe n’iyi kipe”. Uyu musatirizi w’umunye-Portugal yavuze yuko ata “cubahiro” afitiye umumenyereza Erik ten Hag ngo kandi ariko arahindirwa kure ya Old Trafford. Mu rwandiko handitswe hati “Manchester United muri iki gitondo yafashe ivyemezo bibereye mu gusubiza ku kiganiro Cristiano Ronaldo aheruka guha ibitangazamakuru”. Iyo kipe nta bindi izorenzako gushika “ivyemezo vyafashwe bishitse ku musozo wavyo”. Nyuma y’ikiganiro cerekeye ibintu bitandukanye yagiranye n’umunyamakuru Piers Morgna wa TalkTV, kazoza ka Ronaldo muri Man United karacumbagira. Uwo mugabo w’imyaka 37 azoba ari kapitene wa Portugal mu gikombe c’isi i Qatar, urukino rwabo rwa mbere mu mugwi H rukazobahuza na Ghana ku munsi wa kabiri. Ntarasubira gukina kubera uburwayi butatangajwe kuva aho abereye kapitene mu rukino United yatsinzwe 3-1 na Aston Villa, itariki 6 Munyonyo (11). Ten Hag ntiyashize Ronaldo mw’ikipe mu rukino rw’ihiganwa rya Premier League aho bahura na Chelsea mu kwezi guheze, nyuma y’aho yankiye kwinjira mu kibuga nk’uwusubirira uwundi mu rukino na Tottenham, iminsi itatu imbere yaho. Aba Red Devils, baheruka gutsinda Fulham 2-1 kuwa Mungu, ni aba gatanu muri Premier League mu mwaka w’inkino wa mbere wa Ten Hag nk’umumenyereza w’iyi kipe.

column2: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru kuri uyu wa Mungu: Kane, Rodgers, Mourinho, Haaland, Toney
column3: Mauricio Pochettino arashaka cane gukorana n'umusatirizi wa Tottenham n'umurwi nserukiragihugu w'Ubwongereza, Harry Kane w'imyaka 27 muri Paris St-Germain mu gihe Kylian Mbappe w'imyaka 22 canke mugenziwe bakinana, umunya Brezili Neymar w'imyaka 29 bova muri uyu murwi w'Ubufaransa mu ci riza.  (Sunday Mirror) Umumenyereza wa Leicester, Brendan Rodgers niwe ari imbere mu bantu bashobora kuzosubirira Jose Mourinho nk'umumenyereza wa Tottenham  - mu myaka hafi icenda amaze akora iki gikorwa. (Football Insider) Umusatirizi wa Borussia Dortmund, umunya Norvege Erling Braut Haaland w'imyaka 20 ariko asaba imirwi imwipfuza mu ci riza amasezerano y'imyaka itanu azomwinjiriza imiriyoni zirenga 109 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. (Sunday Mirror) Barcelona yamaze gutegura urutonde rw'abo ishobora gutoramwo umusatirizi, harimwo Haaland  hamwe n'umusatirizi wa Manchester City na Argentina, Sergio Aguero w'imyaka 32. (Mundo Deportivo) Leicester iriko iraraba ingene mu ci riza yogura umusatirizi akomeye, umwongereza Ivan Toney w'imyaka 24 asanzwe akinira umurwi Brentford wo mu cicaro ca kabiri mu Bwongereza. (Sunday Mirror) Arsenal yashize umunya cote d'Ivoire Odilon Kossounou w'imyaka 20 akina hagati mu murwi Club Bruges wo mu Bubirigi ku rutonde rw'abakinyi nyamukuru ishobora kurondera mu ci riza. (Sunday Mirror) Eka na Wolves nayo nyene iriko irihweza ingene yoshobora kugura uyu mukinyi afise igiciro kigera ku miriyoni 28 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika. (Sun) Tottenham yiteze kuba mu mirwi iriko irarondera umukinyi wo hagati wa  RB Leipzig umunya Autriche Marcel Sabitzer w'imyaka 26 mu ci riza.  (Team Talk) Umukinyi w'inyuma wa Brighton, umwongereza Ben White w'imyaka 23 abandanya akurikiranirwa hagufi na Liverpool,  kugira irabe ko yomugura mu kiringo c'igura n'igurisha ry'abakinyi mu ci riza.  (Football Insider) Manchester United iriko ikurikiranira hagufi umukiny w'inyuma wa Everton umwongereza Jarrad Branthwaite w'imyaka 18 asanzwe yaratijijwe muri Blackburn. (Mail on Sunday) Manchester United ntiravugana n'abaserukira umukinyi w'inyuma wa Real Madrid na Esupanye, Sergio Ramos w'imyaka  34 azorangiza amasezerano yiwe mu ci riza akaba ashobora kuja gukinira umurwi uwo ari wo wose ku buntu.  (Fabrizio Romano, via Caught Offside) Umukinyi wo hagati wa Newcastle United,  umwongereza Kyle Scott w'imyaka 23 ari mu biganiro, kandi bigeze kure, kugira ngo ashobore kwimukira burundu mu murwi FC Cincinnati ukina mw'ihiganwa ryo muir Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika (Football Insider) Umukinyi w'umudagi Max Kruse w'imyaka 32 ubu asanzwe akinira umurwi Union Berlin, avuga ko yahatswe kwimukira muri Liverpool mu ci ryo mu 2019 imbere y'uko Divock Origi avyifatamwo neza cane mw'ihiganwa rya Buraya (Champions League) bigatuma Jurgen Klopp ahindura imigambi yari afise. (Der Kickbase podcast, via Mail Online) Umuyobozi nshingwabikorwa wa Brighton Paul Barber asaba abarongoye umupira w'amaguru gukora ivyo bashoboye vyose bakihweza nimba gutera umupira n'umutwe vyoba bifise ingaruka mbi mu buzima bwo muri kazoza k'umuntu.  (Argus)

column2: Burundi: Kwugara ububare 21h 'birababaje kubura ico ukeneye mu mwanya wipfuza'
column3: Inyuma y'igisagara ca Bujumbura, ubu na Gitega eka no mu ntara ya Muyinga - ihana urubibe n'u Rwanda -  ububare bwose butegerezwa gupfunga isaha zitatu z'ijoro, abanyagihugu bamwe barabishimye abandi bavuga ko ari ihohoterwa. Buramatari w'intara ya Muyinga na musitanteri wa komine Gitega intara ya Gitega ubu nabo nyene batangaje izi ngingo bavuga ko ari izo kubungabunga umutekano. Abo bategetsi bompi batangaza ko "amasaha yo kwugurura ubunywero ku minsi y'ikirimo ari kuva isaha cumi n'imwe z'umuhingamo gushika isaha zitatu z'ijoro". Izo ngingo ziriko zirafatwa mu gihe ubutegetsi bw'u Burundi bubandanya bumenyesha ko igihugu cose kirangwa mwo umutekano. Izo ngingo zifashwe inyuma y'igitero mu ntara ya Cibitoke, abategetsi bavuze ko cagizwe n'abavuye mu Rwanda bateye ikirindiro c'abasirikare bagasubira muri ico gihugu. Abo bategetsi ntibavuga nimba izo ngingo zifitaniye isano n'ico gitero co mu ntara ya Cibitoke. Umukuru w'igisagara ca Bujumbura wewe, Freddy Mbonimpa, avuga ko ata sano rihari, ahubwo izo ngingo zatangajwe bahejeje ukwisuzuma bagasanga harabayeho ukudebukirwa mu gucungera umutekano. Ku biraba ivyo kwugara akabare vyovyo, Bwana Mbonimpa yavuze ko yafashe izo ngingo kubera ko hari abantu bata akazi, bakigira mu kabare aho kuba bari ku kazi. Muri Komine Gitega bamwe bishimira izo ngingo mu gihe abandi babona ko bahotowe. Ntibipfuje gutangazwa amazina yabo. Umunyagihugu umwe avuga ko izo ngingo zari zaratevye, akabona ko zigiye gushira ku murongo ibitari bike, hampande y'umutekano. Agira ati: "Ubu nta muntu azokwiraza ahantu atamvo iboneka ihari, nta n'uwuzoraza umuntu mukinyegero, ahubwo lmana yakoze gukoresha izo ndongozi kugira bagire ico ciyumviro ". Uwundi abona ko gufata izo ngingo bifise imvo, ariko kwugara akabare isaha zitatu hakiri kare cane. Ati: "Ntivyumvikana ukungene isaha zitatu ubunywero bwose buzoba bwugaye. Izo ni ingorane kandi abantu benshi bagiye guherera mu gasho". Eka n'abadandaza inzoga babona ko bagiye kuhahombera, na rirya ngo isaha betegekwako kwugara ariho abakiriya baba batanguye kunywa. Uwundi munyagihigu abona ko abafashe iyo ngingo bibagiye ko hari vyinshi bituma umuntu aja mukabare, atari uko aba agira ate umwanya gusa. Ati: "Murashobora kuba muri no kwi'jambo ryofasha benshi, canke uvuye ahantu. "Ubundi twizera abarongozi bacu ko ingingo badufatira baba babona ko ari zo zikwiriye, ariko si ukuvuga ko bihimbaye kubura ico ufata wari ugikeneye mu mwanya wipfuza".

column2: Ntahokatarondererwa: Ornella Uwimana yize ivyo kuvura kuri kaminuza ariko akora intebe mu mapine
column3: Umwigeme Ornella Uwimana yahejeje ivyigwa vy'amagara y'abantu muri kaminuza mu 2020 ubu akaba akora akazi ko gukora intebe mu mapine. Intebe za mbere yazikoze mu 2016 akiri ku ntebe y'ishure, umuvyeyi wiwe aca arazimugurira kugira amutere intege. Agira ati:"Naguze amapine umunani ku bihumbi mirongo ine, hanyuma nca ndayakoramwo intebe. "Mu kuntera intege, umuvyeyi wanje arazishima aca arazingurira azishira kw'ibaraza" Ornella avuga ko akunda kwiyigisha gukora ibintu bitandukanye kuri YouTube. Ahejeje kaminuza mu gisata c'ivy'amagara y'abantu "Sante Publique" mu 2020, ivyo gukora intebe mu mapine yaciye abigira umwuga. Avuga ko abona ko amaze gutera imbere ugereranije n'aho yatanguriye. Agira ati: "Natanguye nkorera muhira ariko ubu narakotesheje ikibanza nkoreramwo ndiha ku kwezi. "Nkoresha abakozi batatu baza buri musi, n'abandi bane baza igihe mba ndabakeneye." Gushika ubu avuga ko yoba ageze ku mutahe wa miliyoni zine z'amarundi. Ornella Uwimana ahanura urwaruka kwubahuka gukora ico ari co cose rubona gishobora kuruteza imbere. Avuga ko hari benshi bagaya akazi canke ntibashiruke umwete wo kugakora. Ati: "Hari abambona ndiko ndahiga amapine bagatangara. Bakanayanyima nkarinda guca ku bafundi b'imodoka "Hari n'abantwenga bambonye ndiko ndatobora amapine kandi baheruka nari nagiye gusigisha inzara. "Ubu ariko batanguye gutahura kuko babona ntanguye gutera imbere. Uburundi buherutse gushinga umugambi wa PAEEJ (Programme d'Autonomisation Economique et d'Emploi des Jeunes Diplômés), werekeye urwaruka ruhejeje amashure kugira rwishingire imigambi yo gukora. Uwo mugambi reta yawuhaye imiriyaridi 48 z'amafaranga y'amarundi. Ariko n'ubu hari abacibaza uruhara nyarwo rwa PAEEJ, mu gihe abandi bafise amakenga ko bashobora gufasha koko urwaruka kwigenga mu butunzi rukareka kuzera inze.

column2: Burundi: OLUCOME iriyamiriza ingingo yo kwugara ibiryo vy'abavunjayi (bureau de change)
column3: Umukuru w'ishirahamwe ryishinze kurwanya igiturire n'isesagurwa ry'itunga ry'igihugu, OLUCOME, aranegura ingingo y'Ibanki Nkuru y'u Burundi yo kwugara amazu adandaza amafaranga  mvamakungu. Mw'itangazo yasohoye kuri uyu wa kabiri, Gabriel Rufyiri arongoye Olucome avuga ko iyo ngingo itazotorera umuti ikibazo c'ikena ry'amafaranga mvamakungu cibonekeza mu gihugu. Ku wa 07 z'uku kwa kabiri, Ibanki Nkuru y'Uburundi, BRB, yarafashe ingingo yo kwaka impusha amashirahamwe yose acuruza amafaranga mvamakungu mu Burundi. Iyagiriza ko atashoboye gukurikiza ibiri mu rwandiko rwerekana ingene amafaranga mvamakungu avunjwa, ivyagize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bw'igihugu, nk'uko BRB ibivuga. Mw'iryo tangazo, Bwana Rufyiri avuga ati: "Iyo ata mafaranga y'agaciro ahari, ingingo nk'iyo siyo iza gukemura ikibazo kuko ibiciro vy'amafaranga y'agaciro bivana n'ingene aboneka kw'isoko ryayo". Yibutsa ko iryo kena ry'amafaranga y'agaciro rituma ibidandazwa bimwe bimwe mu gihugu bikena kubera hakenerwa ayo mafaranga kugira ngo hagurwe ibikoresho nkenerwa mu guhingura ivyo bidandazwa. Atanga akarorero k'isima, amafanta, ibiyeri n'ibindi, avuga ko "iyo bibonetse usanga bigurishwa ku biciro vy'umurengera". Kuva Uburundi bwinjiye mu ngorane za politike mu mwaka wa 2015, ibihugu bimwe bimwe vyahora bifasha u Burundi vyarahagaritse imfashanyo vyahora biha ico gihugu, ivyagize ingaruka mbi ku butunzi bwaco, bituma kandi amafaranga y'agaciro akena. Leta y'u Burundi yagiye ifata ingingo mu ntumbero yo kugenzura ko urudandazwa rw'amafaranga mvamakungu, ariko cagumye ari ikibazo ngorabahizi, arico catumyeIbanki Nkuru y'igihugu yugara amashirahamwe yose adandaza ayo mafaranga. Olucome isaba leta kuvyura imigenderanire n'ibihugu bitanga imfashanyo, kwongereza ibidandazwa bishorwa hanze, guhimiriza abarwizatunga b'banyamahanga kuzana imitahe yabo mu gihugu, kunagura igisata c'ingenzi, ivyo vyose kugira ngo amafaranga mvamakungu yinjire mu Burundi.

column2: Coronavirus: Iki kiza kiriko gikora ibara mu turere tw’abirabure b’Abanyamerika
column3: Ibiharuro biteye agahinda bitangwa n'abajejwe amagara y'abantu mu gisagara ca Chicago vyerekana ibitigiri vy'umurengera vya coronavirus mu banyamerika b'abirabure. Abirabure bo muri Chicago bangana hafi igice c'abamaze kwandura coronavirus muri ico gisagara, hamwe n'ibice birenga 70% vy'abamaze guhitanwa n'uwo mugera, n'aho bangana n'ibice 30% vy'abanyagihugu baba muri ico gisagara. Eka n'ibindi bisagara bifise abirabure benshi, harimwo Detroit, Milwaukee, Nouvelles Orléans na New York, navyo nyene vyabaye ikiririmbiro rya coronavirus. Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ziharurwamwo hafi abantu 370.000 bamaze kwandura uwo mugera, hamwe n'abashika 11.OOO bamaze gupfa. Gushika ku wa 05 z'uku kwa kane, abantu 1824 kuri 4680 bari bamaze kwandura Covid-19 muri Chicago, bari abirabure, nk'uko vyashikirijwe n'abarongoye ico gisagara ejo ku wa mbere. Aho ni mu gihe abazungu bari bamaze kwandura ari 847, aba Hispanic (abanyamerika bava muri Amerika y'Epfo bavuga iki Espagnole) 478, hamwe na 126 bakomoka muri Aziya. Gushika ku wa Mungu, Chicago yari imaze guharurwamwo abantu 98 bamaze gupfa, muri bo ibice 72% bakaba ari abirabure. Ubwo busumbane buribonekeza mu ntara yose ya Illinois, aho abamaze guhitanwa na Covid-19 ibice 41% ari abirabure, mu gihe bagize ibice 14% vy'abanyagihugu bose baba muri iyo ntara. Umukuru w'igisata kijejwe amagara y'abantu mu gisagara ca Chicago, Dr Allison Arwady, avuga ko abirabure bari basanzwe babayeho mu buzima bubayabaye ugereranije na bagenzi babo b'abazungu. Umukuru w'ico gisagara, Lori Lightfoot, avuga ko coronavirus "ibandanya  yiha inkumbi mu birabure ba Chicago". Avuga ko abagenzuzi b'igisagara bashobora kuzunguruka mu maduka kugira ngo barabe ko bose bakurikiza ingingo zo kutegerana. Umupfasoni Lightfoot, avuga y'uko bibaye ngombwa bashobora gutera umukwabu bagahagarika uruja n'uruza mu turere abantu bakoraniramwo bihereza inzoga zikaze cane, nk'uko vyandikwa n'ikinyamakuru gikorera aho muri Chicago, Sun-Times. N'aho coronavirus ivugwa ko "itarenganya", ibiharuro birerekana ko uburere bwose butabangamiwe ku rugero rumwe. Muri Michigan, Abanyamerika b'abirabure bangana ibice 14% vy'abanyagihugu bose, ariko mu bantu bose bamaze kwandura abirabure bangana n'ibice 33%, nayo mu bamaze kuhasiga ubuzima abirabure bangana n'ibice 41%, nk'uko vyerekanwa n'igisata kijejwe amagara y'abantu muri iyo ntara ejo ku wa mbere. Muri abo bamaze kwandura muri iyo ntara nyene, abazungu ni ibice 23% , hamwe na 28% vy'abamaze gupfa, nk'uko ivyo biharuro bivyerekana. Mu gisagara ca Detroit muri iyo ntara ya Michigan, abirabure bangana n'ibice 80%, abashizwe ukwabo muri ico gisagara no mu micungararo yaco bakaba ari ibice 80%. Ubwo busumbane kandi buribonekeza mu gisagara ca Milwaukee c'intara ya Wisconsin, kiri mu bisagara vyashizwe inyuma cane muri Amerika. Mu bantu hafi 1000 banduye ku wa gatanu w'indwi iheze muri Amerika, hafi inusu y'abanduye mu gisagara ca Milwaukee bari abirabure, bakaba kandi bangana n'ibice 81% muri 27 bapfuye muri ico gisagara, n'aho abirabure baba muri co bangana n'ibice 26%, nk'uko vyerekanwa n'icigwa cakozwe n'ikigo ProPublica. Mu ntara ya Louisiana, ibice hafi 40% vy'abamaze guhitanwa na coronavirus biri mu karere ka Nouvelle-Orléans gasanzwe gatuwemwo n'abirabure benshi gusumba abandi. Muri Amerika, ico kiza kiriko kirunyura ubusumbasumbane bufatiye ku butunzi n'amoko, nk'uko Dr Cameron Webb, umunyamerika w'umwirabure ariko yiyamamariza ubukenguzamateka mu ntara ya Virginia yabibwiye BBC. Ati: "Ni ukuri kiriko kiragaragaza ubusumbasumbane buri mu gihugu cacu".

column2: Ingene twumva ico dukozeko n'ubushuhe vyaronse agashimwe ka Nobel
column3: Abahinga batoye ingene imibiri yacu yumva ubushuhe canke uguhoberwa n'uwo ukunda batsindiye agashimwe ka Nobel. David Julius na Ardem Patapoutian bo muri reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, basangiye ako gashimwe ko mu gisata c'ubuvuzi n'ico kwiga ingene ingingo z'umubiri zikora (physiologie) kubera igikorwa cabo ku kwumva ico ukozeko canke kigukozeko  hamwe n'ubushuhe. Batoye ingene bigenda kugira imibiri yacu ihindure ico umubiri wumva hari ikiwukozeko mu butumwa bw'umuyagankuba (amashanyarari) buca buja mu nzira z'ubwonko. Ivyo batoye bishobora gushika ku nzira nshasha z'ingene hagwanywa ububabare. Ubushuhe, imbeho (ubukonje) bifise ikibanza gikomeye mu kwumva ibiri iruhande yacu kugira dushobore  kubaho. Ariko ingene umubiri wacu ubikora canke ubigenza vyari bikiri  amayobera mu cigwa c'ubuzima (biologie). Abavumbuye Hepatite C bahawe igihembo cya Nobel Igihembo cy'amahoro cya Nobel cyahawe PAM Thomas Perlman, wo mu mugwi w'abatanga agashimwe ka Nobel, yavuze ati: "Ivyatowe ni ibintu bikomeye kandi vyimbitse cane." Yongerako ati: "Ibi vy'ukuri vyuguruye bimwe mu vyari bikiri ibinyegezwa ku bibaho". Ivyo Professeur David Julius yashitseko kuri kaminuza ya California, San Fransisco, vyavuye mu bushakashatsi ku bubare twumva iyo turiye ipiripiri ibaba, ico umuntu yovuga nk'ubumara (chemical ) bwitwa capsaicin. Yakoze ku nkomoko canke isoko ry'ukubaba mw'ipiripiri. Yatoye igice cihariye cakira/cumva  (recepteur) (nk'ikigize  uturemangingo  twacu twumva ibintu biri iruhande yacu)   ari naco giheza kigatanga ubutumwa ko  cumvise capsaicin. Ibindi bipimo vyerekanye ko iyo recepteur itanga ubutumwa ko yumvise ubushuhe kandi bubaye bwinshi ikabimenyesha. Ibi nivyo bishika , nk'akarorero, iyo intoke zituriwe n'igikombe c'icayi. Ivyo yatoye vyamushikanye ku  gutora utundi duce twinshi twakira canke twumva ubushuhe. Iyo uriko uraca ku musenyi ukawumva munsi y'ibirenge vyawe - izo 'recepteurs' nizo ziba zirungitse ubutumwa mu bwonko. Umugwi utanga agashimwe ka Nobel wavuze ko "Ubwo bumenyi buriko burakoreshwa mu kurondera ingene hovurwa ibiva ku ndwara zitandukanye harimwo ububabare buguma bugaruka." Abo babiri bazogabura ako gashimwe gaciye miriyoni cumi z'amafaranga ya Suede ( arenga umuriyoni w'ama dorari). Agashimwe ka Nobel gahabwa umuntu yagize igikorwa gifasha abantu mu kubaho kwabo. Ako gashimwe kitiriwe Alfred Nobel, umunya-Suede yatoye dynamite (bakoresha nko  mu guturitsa ibibuye binini binini nk'iyo bariko baraca/barubaka  amabarabara.

column2: Abavugabutumwa bo muri Africa bariko basabira Trump ngo atsinde amatora
column3: N'aho asanzwe afise imvugo y'agasuzuguro kuri Afrika, Perezida Donald Trump wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika arakunzwe cane na bamwe mu bihaye Imana bo kuri uyu mugabane. Mu nyigisho ziwe yatanze mu kwa gatandatu, Pasitori wo muri Nijeriya, Chris Oyakhilome, umuvugabutumwa azwi cane ku mboneshakure, yagize ati: "Mumusengere [Trump] kuko iyo Imana ishize imbere umwe mu bana biwe, shetani rimwe na rimwe ikora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo imusambure". Agabisha kandi ko abanegura uyu mukuru w'igihugu akomoka mu mugambwe w'aba Repubulika ariko arondera kwitoreza ikiringo kigira kabiri mu kwa cumi na rimwe banka urunuka abamushigikiye. Uyu mupasitori akunzwe cane kw'isi yose, harimwo na Amerika avuga ati: "Bafitiye ishavu ryinshi Trump kubera arwanira abakristu/abakristo, ico mukimenye. Rero abankwa ni mwebwe abakristu". Ikigo Pew Research gikora ubushakashatsi ku mibereho y'abantu kivuga ko mu gihe Perezida Trump azwi ko ari umutegetsi yacanishijemwo isi, mu bihugu nka Nijeriya na Kenya arakundwa cane nk'uko amatohoza y'iki kigo yavyerekanye mu kwa mbere uno mwaka. Kivuga ko amajambo yavuze mu 2018 yo kugereranya ibihugu vya Afrika "nk'imisarani" bobo ko ata kibazo ateye. Ibi bihugu vyompi bisanzwe bizwi ko bigendera cane ku madini. Mu bumanuko bwa Nijeriya, igihugu ca Afrika gifise abantu benshi, harangwamwo amashengero menshi, mu gihe muri Kenya naho abanyapolitike bakoresha cane amashengero mu gutanga ubutumwa ku banywanyi babo, ari naco gituma amadini afise ikibanza kinini muri ibi bihugu. Amashengero menshi ya kikristu muri Afrika, asanzwe arwanya cane ivyo gukorora inda, abubakana bahuje ibitsina, bakongera bagashigikira Israyeli, ntibigeze biyumvamwo uwasubiriwe na Trump, umu Democrate Barack Obama, n'aho afise amamuko muri Kenya. Richard Chogo, Pasitori mu rusengero rwa Deliverance ku mugwa mukuru wa Kenya, Nairobi, yabwiye BBC ati: "Ubutegetsi bwa Obama bwarahimirije umugambi w'ukwigenga (liberalisme) hano muri Afrika, kandi uwu mugambi wateje impungenge mu bategetsi bamwe bamwe b'amadini. Rero kabaye agahengwe ku butegetsi bwa Trump yahisemwo gusubiza ibirenge inyuma". Arashimagiza ubutegetsi bwa Trump kubona bwarashoboye guhagarika imfashanyo zahabwa amashirahamwe nka Marie Stopes, yafasha mu buryo bwo kugabanya imvyaro n'ugukoroza inda mu bihugu bitari bike vya Afrika. Iri shirahamwe ryaraneguye iyi ngingo ya Amerika yo guhagarika izi mfashanyo, rivuga ko rishira "ubuzima bw'abakenyezi mu kaga". Impari ku bijanye no gukoroza inda zimaze imyaka n'imiburiburi irenga 40. Kuva ico gihe, abavugabutumwa b'abazungu bagize uruhara rukomeye mu matora ku ruhande rw'aba Repubulika kandi ivyiyumviro vyabo vyarakwiye kw'isi yose, cane cane muri Afrika. Ibi bimeze uku mu gihe Abaporotesanti b'abirabure benshi muri Amerika bashigikiye umugambwe uharanira Demokarasi kandi bakanegura ubutegetsi bwa Trump, nk'uko icegeranyo gishasha ca  Pew Research kivyerekana. Emeka Ezeji, umupasitori mukuru mw'ishengero rya Anglicani mu ntara ya Enugu iri mu bumanuko bushira ubuseruko bwa Nijeriya, avuga ko ivyiyumviro vyiwe vya politike bishingiye "ku vyanditswe" gusa. Avuga ati: "Abakristu ba Afrika bazi ko umukuru w'igihugu w'umu Repubulika ari we mwiza kuri Amerika no kw'isi". Abandanya asengera Perezida Trump ko yotsinda umukeba wiwe wo mu mugambwe w'abaharanira Demokarasi Joe Biden mu matora ategekanijwe mu kwa cumi na rimwe, kandi ko yari yafashe umwanya iminsi yose wo gusengera uyu mukuru w'igihugu ngo akire igihe aheruka mu bitaro  kubera coronavirus. Nk'uko bimeze kuri Pasitori Chogo, na we nyene abona ko "intege nke" za Trump zidategerezwa kurengera "inyungu rusangi". Nk'akarorero, ariyamiriza rya sekeza rya Black Lives Matter (Ubuzima bw'abirabure ni kirumara), isekeza Trump afata ko ari "ikimenyetso c'urwanko", akavuga ko "ryanyazwe intumbero yaryo". Yibaza ibibazo vyinshi aho avuga ati: "Abandi bantu atari abazungu nta vanguraruhu bakorerwa? Ubuzima bw'umwirabure abayabaye ubu bwoba ari bwiza ugereranije n'imyaka indwi iheze? Canke umwirabure abayabaye ubu yoba ageramiwe ubu kuri Trump gusumba kuri Obama?" Bwana Trump arirata ko ari we mu perezida wa Amerika amaze gukorera ivyiza vyinshi Abanyamerika bakomoka muri Afrika gusumba abandi baperezida bose  mu mateka ya  Amerika, kenshi agafatira ku rugero ruto rw'ubushomeri mu myaka itatu ya mbere y'ubutegetsi bwiwe, ico Bwana Ezeji akenguruka cane. Ubunyamabanga bujejwe akazi buvuga ko igitigiri c'abashomeri b'abirabure mu kw'icenda ari co gitigiri gito cane cabayeho kuva butanguye kwegeranya ibiharuro nk'ibi mu myaka ya 1970, n'aho ibi vyahindutse kubera coronavirus. Ariko Pasitori Ezeji  avuga ko Bwana Trump agifise igikorwa kinini ategerezwa gukora ku neza ya bose, aha akaba afatira ku mwami Cyrus (Kuro) w'umu perse avugwa muri Biblia ko yari yatoranijwe n'Imana kugira ngo yigarurire Babiloni, maze abanya Isirayeli bari bahunze  banona gusubira i Yerusalemu. Avuga ati: "Trump niwe we Kuro wa kino gihe". Bwana Emeka  avuga ati: "Imana irabivuze....ni umusuku wanje azorangura ishaka ryanje". Pasitori Juliet Eyimofe Binite ari mu gisagara ca Lagos muri Nijeriya aremeranya nawe. Yabwiye BBC ati: "Yatowe n'Imana". Buri ku ndwi, uyu mupasitori w'umugore yama asengera  Trump ngo atsinde amatora ku ncuro ya kabiri. Avuga ko Imana yamuhaye ubutumwa imbere y'amatora ya 2016 ko hari umuntu atunze cane yinjiye muri politike kandi ko ashigikiye ubwigenge bw'amadini, abakristu babona ko bubangamiwe. Avuga ati: "Yambwiye ko yariko irarondera umukozi, umuntu w'intungane kubera hari ibikorwa bimwe bimwe abantu beza badashobora gukora". "Dukeneye umuntu ashobora kurwanira agateka k'abemera". Avuga kandi ko Trump ataronka amashimwe akwiriye kuri politike yiwe mpuzamakungu, nk'akarorero amasezerano y'amahoro hagati ya Isirayeli na Emira Zunze Ubumwe z'Abararu (Emirats Arabes Unis). Pasitori Chogo na we nyene niko abibona: "N'aho woba uri Saddam Hussein cane Muammar Gaddafi, ntihabuze nk'ikintu kimwe canke bibiri vyiza wakoreye abanyagihugu bawe". Avuga ko Trump ashigikiwe ku mugabane wa Afrika kubera ukuntu atarya umunwa, aho avuga ko abategetsi ba Afrika bakeneye kubwirwa mu majambo yeruye kugira ngo bashobore gutunganya ibihugu vyabo. Mu butumwa butandukanye yanditse ku rubuga rwa Twitter, Bwana Trump aherutse kwibutsa abakristu bamushigikiye ko ubwisanzure mu vyo gusenga hamwe n'urugamba rwo kurwanya umugenzo wo gukoroza inda bishobora gukwama mu gihe atotsinda amatora yo mu kwa cumi na rimwe. Ariko Pasitori Ezeji afata ibintu yishimikije ubuhanuzi bwa Bibiliya buvuga ibihe vya nyuma. Ati: "Ko azotsinda canke atazotsinda, ico si ikibazo ca Trump, ahubwo ni ikibazo c'ivyo Imana ivuga". "Trump ni nka ca giti co muri Biblia abihweza ibirere bafatirako mu kwihweza ibimenyetso vy'ibihe...aramutse atsinze, tuzoba tugifise igihe co kubaho, nayo akaramuka atsinzwe nta gihe tuzoba tugisigaje".

column2: Abantu bashika 30 bahitanywe n'ibisasu hirya no hino muri Afuganisitani
column3: Abantu bashika 30 bahitanywe n'urukurikirane rw'ibisasu vyaturikiye mu mpande zitandukanye z'igihugu ca Afuganisitani. Abashika ku munani baguye ku murwa mukuru Kabul, igihe ibisasu bitatu vyaturika bikurikirana mu mwanya muto. Ubushikiranganji bw'intwaro yo hagati bwavuze ko mu gitero kimwe, umwiyahuzi yagereye ibisi yari itwaye abakozi ba leta. Mu ntara ya Takhar, mu buraruko bwa Kabul, igitero c'aba Taliban kuri bariyeri zibiri cahitanye abapolisi batandatu, nayo i Nangarhar, abandi bantu indwi bahitwanywe n'igisasu caturikiye mu mpande z'ibarabara. Abahinga mu vy'umutekano bavuga ko ibitero vy'aba Taliban bigenda biraba vyinshi kugira biyongere igihagararo mu gihe bari mu biganiro na Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.

column2: Umushikiranganji wa mbere w’ Ubuyapani aragabisha Afrika ku madeni y’umurengera
column3: Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubuyapani aragabisha abategetsi ba Afrika ku ngaruka z'ugufata amadeni menshi, nk'uko bishikirizwa n'itororokaniriza ry'amakuru AFP. Ayo majambo ya Shinzo Abe afatwa nk'igabisha ku ruhara rw'Ubushinwa muri Afrika mu gihe buvugwa ko bushira imbere amakompanyi yabwo mu migambi ikomeye kuri uwo mugabane. Yabwiye abategetsi bari mu nama i Yokohama muri ico gihugu yerekeye iterambere rya Afrika ko Ubuyapani bwipfuza guteza imbere imitahe "ngirakamaro" yoshigikirwa n'amashirahamwe y'Ubuyapani. AFP ivuga ko ico gihugu gitegekanya kwigisha abahinga 30 bava mu bihugu vya Afrika  mu myaka itatu iri imbere ku buryo bwo guhangana n'ibiza n'amadeni ku gihugu. Avuga ko abakora imigambi y'iterambere boterwa intege kugira ngo bashobore guteza imbere ubutunzi ku mugabane wa Afrika. Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubuyapani yasubiwemwo amajambo avuga ati: " Mu gihe ibihugu bigenzi vyugarijwe n'amadeni y'umurengera, bica biba inzitizi kuri uyo wese yari afise imigambi y'ukuzana imitahe yabo". Bwana Abe ari mu barongoye inama mpuzamakungu ya Tokyo kw'iterambere rya Afrika (Ticad), ikaba yateguwe mu gihe Ubushinwa buriko bushinga imizi muri Afrika. Ubuyapani buvuga ko intumbero bufise kuri Afrika ari ukuyifata mu mugongo mu buryo bw'amafaranga n'ikoreshwa ryayo, intumbero itandukanye n'iyo Ubushinwa.

column2: Ubukritsu - Isilamu: hoba hari isano hagati ya Isilamu hamwe na Yezu/Yesu na Maria
column3: Mu bihugu birwiriyemwo Abakristu, muri kino gihe ikintu kivugwa ni Noweri/Noheli, mu ndimi mvamahanga naho ni Noel canke Christmas. Biragoye kwibaza ko hoba hari ibihugu uyu munsi mukuru utazwi na gato, bobo usanga ari umunsi usanzwe nk'iyindi. Igituma nyamukuru ni uko uyu munsi ari umunsi wo kwibuka ivuka rya Yezu, umunsi wubahwa cane rwose mu mashengero y'abakristu. Mu bihugu uyu munsi mukuru wa Noweri utazwi, canke udahimbazwa harimwo ibihugu bigendera kw'idini rya Isilamu, Nk'akarorero muri Turukiya, iri genekerezo rya 25 z'ukwa cumi na kabiri ni umunsi usanzwe ku kirangamisi cayo. Uyu munsi mukuru ntawuriho ku birangamisi ry'abayahudi, Abahindi canke vy''Abasilamu. Mu bihugu vy'Abasilamu, uyu munsi mukuru usa n'iminsi mikuru ya Eid, ariho Abasilamu baja hamwe, bagatumirara, bagateka, bakagenderanira, bagatanga ishikanwa, bakambara bakaberwa bakaja gusenga mu misigiti. Nimba ushaka gutahura itandukanirizo riri hagati y'aya madini, ntuze wigere wipfuriza Umusilamu Noweri nziza. Ariko rero, si ukuvuga ko Yezu/Yesu atazwi mw'idini rya Isilamu. Yezu/Yesu canke Jesus, uba uvuze Issa? Ibi rero biratangaza abantu benshi batabizi. Abasilamu ntibahimbaza ivuka rya Yezu, ariko barakurikiza inyigisho ziwe. Abasilamu barubaha cane uyu bita intumwa y'Imana kandi afise ikibanza kidasanzwe mu kwemera kwabo. Igitabo c'Ikorowani gifata Yezu nk'umwe mu ntumwa z'Imana zubahwa cane zaboneye izuba Intumwa Muhammad (S.A.W.- Sallā Allāhu ʿalayhi Wa-sallam). Yezu mu rurimi rw'icarabu ni ukuvuga Issa, kandi aravugwa incuro nyinshi cane mw'Ikorowani, mbere aravugwa cane gusumba na Muhammad muri iki gitabo ceranda. Si ivyo gusa, harimwo n'umugore umwe rudende izina ryiwe rivugwa mw'ico gitabu ceranda c'idini rya Isilamu. Maria canke Mariam, Ikorowani imusigura gute? Uyo mugore ni Bikira Maria, mu rurimi rw'icarabu akaba azwi kw'izina rya Mariam/Maryam. Mw'Ikorowani, hari igice cose kimuvuga, kigasigura ingene yavyaye umwana kandi yari asanzwe ari isugi. Gusa iyo iriko irasigura ivy'ivuka rya Yezu, Isilamu ntiyigera ivuga ivya Yozefu, canke ba ba majusi baza bavuye mu buseruko, canke ngo bavuge ingene yaryamitswe mu bwato bw'inka. Maria yibarutse ari wenyene mu bugaragwa, ari musi y'igiti c'umunazi cumye. Aho nyene haciye haba igitangaro, inazi zihiye neza zaciye zitangura gukoroka ziva kuri ico giti cumye maze ziba imfungurwa yiwe. Hanyuma kandi, mu maguru yiwe haciye havuka umugezi w'amazi meza cane maze aba inyobwa yiwe. Umukobwa atararongorwa iyo avyaye bitera ibibazo vyinshi cane ku bijanye n'indero yiwe. Ariko uyo mwana  - Yezu/Issa - amaze kuvuka, yaciye atangura kuvuga nk'intumwa y'imana. Iki gitangaro nico gikura iceyi nyina wiwe. Iyo Abasilamu bavuga Yezu, bategerezwa gushirako Alayhi Salaam- Imigisha y'Imana ibane na we, nk'uko babivuga ku Ntumwa Muhammad n'abandi bahanuzi. Hanyuma kandi, ni nde arindiriwe ku munsi w'iherezo ku munsi w'urubanza no kugarura amahoro kw'isi, kubw'idini rya Isilamu? Ni Yezu, aho azogarukira ubugira kabiri, kandi uku kuninahazwa kwiwe kuri no mu bindi bitabo vya Isilamu, si mw'Ikorowani gusa. Umuhinga w'Umusufi, Al-Ghazali, amusobanura "nk'Intumwa ityorora imitima y'abantu". Ibn Arabi aramwandikako aho avuga ko ari "ikimenyetso c'ubweranda". Mu gihugu vyose birimwo Abasilamu, hari abahungu bahabwa izina rya Issa (Yezu), abakobwa nabo bagahabwa amazina ya Maryam (Maria). Aha urashobora kwibaza nk'umuntu ava mu muryango w'abakristu yokwita umwana wiwe Muhammad ingene vyomugendera? Idini rya Isilamu rirazi neza Yezu, kubera igihe rivuka, mu kinjana c'indwi, idini ry'Ubukristu ryari rishinze imizi mu karere k'Uburasirazuba bwo Hagati. Muhammad nta hantu na hamwe avugwa muri Bibiriya. N'aho idini rya Isilamu riha icubahiro Yezu, si ukuvuga ko mu binjana vyakurikiye iri dini rya Gikristu naryo ryabasubirije mu ndumane. Ahubwo, mu gicapo kinini co mu kinjana ca 15 kiri mw'isengero nkuru ya San Petronio mu gisagara ca Bologne mu Butariyano, uyu muhanuzi mukuru wa Isilamu yerekanwa ari mu muriro udahera, ariko arababazwa n'amashetani. Harabaye ibishushanyo vyinhi vyerekana nabi cane Intumwa Muhammad. Umuhinyanyuzi w'umutariyano Giovani da Modena yarashingiye cane ku munyavyese azwi cane Dante Alighieri, yashize Muhammad ku muzingi w'icenda w'ikuzimu mu gitabo ciwe c'ivyese citwa Divine Comedy. Iki gitabo carakoreshejwe cane n'abanyatugenegene n'abahinyanyuzi benshi ba Bulaya gushika mu kinjana ca 18 mu gushushanya Intumwa Muhammad bamwerekana ariko arahanwa mu muriro udahera. Kimwe muri ivyo bishushanyo, ni ica William Blake, umunyatugenegene akomeye cane w'umwongereza mu masanamu n'inzandiko ziwe. Mw'isengero imwe yo mu Bubirigi, hari ibishushanyo vyo mu kinjana ca 17 vyerekana iyi ntumwa ya Isilamu aryamitswe hasi ariko ahonyangwa n'abamarayika. Ibintu vyagiye guhinduka mu nyuma ku bijanye n'ingene idini rya Gikristu rifata Intumwa muhammad. Ariko gusa gushika muri kino gihe, haracari icuka kibi. Mu mwaka wa 2002, imirwi y'intagondwa ya Isilamu yaragirijwe ko yashatse kubomora ico gishushanyo co mw'isengero ya Bologne. Kuva ico gihe, harabaye ibitero vyinshi vyahitanye abantu, ibitero vyakozwe kw'izina ry'idini rya Isilamu mu bihugu bitari bike vya Buraya n'ibirwiriyemwo Abasilamu. Ibi bitero vyatumye icuka kibi hagati y'ama madini abiri kibandanya ciyongera. Hari ababona ko kumenya isano riri hagati ya Yezu n'idini rya Isilamu, hamwe n'ikibanza afise muri iri dini, bishobora gufasha Abakristu n'Abasilamu kunywana. Babona ko kwibanda ku vyo basangiye hakwibanda ku bibatandukanya bishobora gufasha gukuraho iki cuka kibi kihari.

column2: Afghanistan: Igituma aba Taliban bariko barafata igihugu ku muvuduko udasanzwe
column3: Umuvuduko aba Taliban bariko mu kwifatira uturere muri Afghanistan uratangaza abantu batari bake - mu gihe imigwa mikuru y'intara igenda yigarurirwa nk'uwinjira mu nzu iwe. Abarwanyi baboneka ko bafise inguvu, mu gihe reta ya Afghanistan igerageza kwita ku rutare ngo igumane ubutegetsi. Muri ino ndwi. inkuru yavuye mu gisata kijejwe igendereza ca Amerika yerekana ko umugwa mukuru Kabul ushobora guterwa mu ndwi nkeya ziri imbere, nayo reta yoyo igashobora gusenyuka mu misi itarenga 90. None ni ukubera iki ibintu binyarutse ukuraho? Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika n'ibihugu bigenzi vyayo vyo mw'ishirahamwe OTAN/NATO - harimwo n'Ubwongereza - vyari bimaze imyaka 20 yose vyigisha ingabo za Afghanistan, vyongera biziha ibikoresho. Abajenerali batari bake b'abanyamerika n'abongereza bahora bivugira ko bashinze igisirikare ca Afghanistan gikomeye kandi gishoboye. Ibi bikaba muri kino gihe bisa n'uko yari amajambo gusa. Reta ya Afghanistan mu bisanzwe yategerezwa kuba ari yo ifise ibintu mu minwe uravye ibitigiri binini vy'ingabo ifise. Uravye ku mpapuro, inzego zijejwe umutekano za Afghanistan zigera ku  300.000. Aha harimwo igisirikare ca Afghanistan, ingabo zirwanira mu kirere hamwe n'igiporisi. Ariko mu vy'ukuri, igihugu camye gifise ingorane zo gushika ku ntego zaco mu bijanye no  kwinjiza abasirikare. Igisirikare ca Afghanistan  gifise kahise kabi karanzwe n'abapfa ku bwinshi, abahunga urugamba n'ibiturire - aho hari intwazangabo zimwe zimwe zidaterwa isoni no gusaba imishahara y'abasirikare batahari. - bazwi nka "soldats fantômes/ghost soldiers". Mu cegeranyo aherutse gushikiriza inama nshingamateka na nkenguzamateka ya Amerika, uwujejwe gukurikirana ibikorwa vyo gusanura Afghanistan (Special Inspector General for Afghanistan, SIGAR) yarerekanye "amakenga akomeye ku ngaruka mbi cane z'igiturire...hamwe n'igitigiri kidatomoye c'ingabo nyezina". Jack Watling wo mu kigo Royal United Services Institute (RUSI), avuga ko igisirikare ca Afghanistan kitigeze kimenya igitigiri nyezina c'abasirikare gifise. Hambavu y'ibi, avuga ko hamye hari ingorane yo kubungabunga ibikoresho na morale. Akenshi abasirikare bakunze kurungikwa mu turere basanzwe badakomokamwo batanafisemwo imiryango n'incuti. Iki kiboneka nka kimwe mu bishobora kuba bituma bihuta guta ibirindiro vyabo batanarwanye. Biranagoye no kumenya inguvu z'aba Taliban. Igisata ca Amerika kijejwe kurwanya iterabwoba, US Combating Terrorism Center, kiri kw'ishure rya gisirikare rya West Point, kivuga ko aba barwanyi boba bangana na 60.000. Hiyongereyeko n'iyindi mirwi y'abarwanyi n'ababashigikiye, iki gitigiri gishobora kuba kirenga 200.000. Ariko Dr Mike Martin yahoze ari intwazangabo y'umwongereza avuga ururimi rw'igi Pashto akaba yarakurikiranye intambara yo mu ntara ya Helmand akanavyandika no mu gitabo ciwe yise An Intimate War, aragabisha abafata aba Taliban nk'umurwi umwe rudende. Ahubwo avuga ko "aba Taliban ari nk'ihuriro ry'imirwi itandukanye yigenga - kandi igira ivyo ihurirako mu gihe kanaka". Avuga ko na reta ya Afghanistan nayo nyene ifise ingorane z'imirwi irondera inyungu zayo. Akahise kagenda gahindagurika karerekana ingene imiryango, imirwi y'amoko mbere n'abategetsi ba reta bagiye baba mahindagu - akenshi barondera ko boba baramaze na kabiri. Hanyuma kandi, reta ya Afghanistan yategerezwa kuba ifise akarusho gasumbirije mu bijanye n'amafaranga hamwe n'ibirwanisho. Yararonse amamiriyaridi n'amamiriyaridi y'amadorari yo kuriha imishahara y'abasirikare no kugura ibikoresho - ahanini bahabwa na Amerika. Mu cegeranyo cayo co mu kw'indwi 2021, SIGAR  ivuga ko imiriyaridi zirenga 88 z'amadorari y'abanyamerika zakoreshejwe mu bijanye n'umutekano wa Afghanistan. Ariko mu buryo buteye impungenge congera ko kiti: "Ivyo kumenya nimba ayo mafaranga yakoreshwa neza bizovana n'ingene bavyifashemwo ku rugamba". Igisirikare ca Afghanistan kirwanira mu kirere categerezwa kuvyifatamwo neza ku rugamba. Ariko camye mu ngorane zo kubungabunga no kugendesha izi ndege zingana na 211 (ikibazo kigenda gikomera mu gihe aba Taliban batera n'ibigirankana abadereva bazo). Nta n'ubwo gishobora no kuronsa ivyankenerwa intwazangabo ziri ku rubuga rw'intambara. Ari co gituma vyabaye ngombwa ko igisirikare ca Amerika kirwanira mu kirere kiza gufasha mu bisagara nka Lashkar Gah catewe n'abarwanyi b'aba Taliban. Aba  Taliban bakunze kuronka amahera bakura mu rucuruzwa rw'ibiyayuramutwe, ariko kandi bararonka n'izindi mfashanyo ziva hanze - ahanini muri Pakistan. Ubuheruka, aba Taliban barafashe ibirwanisho n'ibindi bikoresho bavyatse  ingabo za Afghanistan - bimwe muri vyo bikaba ari ivyatanzwe na Amerika - harimwo n'ibimodoka Humvees vya burende (blindés), ibikoresho bifasha kubona mw'ijoro, inkoho zikomakomeye hamwe na vya muzinga. Afghanistan yari isanzwe yuzuye ibirwanisho inyuma y'intambara yayihuje n'icahoze ari Repubulika Zunze Ubumwe y'aba Soviet (URSS), kandi aba Taliban barerekanye ko bashobora gutsinda igisirikare gikomeye cane n'aho boba bakoresha ibirwanisho bishaje. Iyumvire ingene inganda zatikiye mu ngabo za Amerika n'iz'Ubwongereza bakoresheje ya mabombe ategwa mu kuzimu ( Improvised Explosive Device, IED). Iki, gifatanye n'ingene bazi akarere, caratumye bavyifatamwo neza. N'aho aba Taliban bamye baboneka ko batari hamwe, biraboneka ko muri izi ntambara bafise integuro itomoye. Ben Barry yahoze ari intwazangabo mu gisirikare c'Ubwongereza avuga ko aba Taliban bashobora kuba bashika ku vyo bashikako giturumbuka, ariko akongerako ati: "Mu gihe wogira uti utegure ibijanye n'isekeza, vyogorana cane kuronka ikintu ciza kirenze kuri ibi". Yerekana ingene ibitero vy'aba Taliban vyibanze mu buraruko no mu burengero, hakwihutira intara zahoze ari ibirindiro vyabo vyo mu bumanuko, aho bagenda bigarurira imigwa mikuru y'intara imwe ku yindi. Aba Taliban barigaruriye imihora mikuru mikuru ijana mu bihugu vyo hanze, ibi bigatuma banyuruza amafaranga menshi ava mu makori yari kwegeranywa na reta isanzwe iri mu bukene bw'amafaranga. Barongereje akariro kandi mu kwica abategetsi bakuru bakuru, abaharanira agateka ka muntu n'abanyamakuru. Bukebuke bagenda bafuta bimwe mu vyashitsweko muri ino myaka 20 iheze. Nayo ku bijanye n'integuro ya reta - aha ntivyoroshe gusigura. Ivyo kwisubiza uturere twigaruriwe n'aba Taliban bigenda biba nk'umugani. Barry avuga ko bisa n'uko hari integuro yo gukingira ibisagara bikuru bikuru. Ariko kugeza ryari? Igitigiri c'ingabo zidasanzwe za Afghanistan ni gito cane, hafi 10.000 kandi zinyanyagijwe irya n'ino. Aba Taliban kandi baboneka ko bariko baratsinda intambara ya propagande n'iy'amajambo. Barry avuga ko inguvu zabo ku rugamba zatumye morale yabo iduga kandi bibatuma bumva ko bategerezwa gukorera hamwe. Ariko ku rundi ruhande ntibimeze uko, reta ya Afghanistan igenda isubira inyuma nk'ibirenge, baterana amajambo, birukana intwazangabo z'abajenerali. Ibintu bimeze nabi cane kuri reta ya Afghanistan. Ariko Jack Watling wa RUSI avuga ko n'aho atari heza na gato ku gisirikare ca Afghanistan, "poritike ishobora gusubiza ibintu mu buryo". Mu gihe reta yoshobora kwigarurira abarongoye amoko, abona ko reta ishobora kugira amahirwe yo kwihagararako. Ibi kandi niko Mike Martin abibona, akabona ko kubona uwahoze ari umukuru w'abarwanyi Abdul Rashid Dostum agaruka mu gisagara ca Mazar-i-Sharif kigira kane c'igihugu, ari ikintu gikomeye cane. Yanatanguye n'ibiganiro. Iyi ntambara yo mu ci mu misi irarangira mu gihe urushana ruzoba rutanguye muri Afghanistan - iki gihe kikaba kitorosha ibintu ku barwanyi. Biracashoboka ko Afghanistan ishika mu mpera z'umwaka icihagazeko, ikagumana Kabul n'ibisagara bikuru bikuru bimwe bimwe. Vyongeye, mu gihe aba Taliban boramuka bacanyemwo, ibintu bishobora kubahindukana bikaba nabi. Ariko ubu, bisa n'uko utwigoro twa Amerika na OTAN two kugarukana amahoro, umutekano n'ituze muri Afghanistan twabaye impfagusa, nk'uko vyagendeye aba Soviet imbere yabo.

column2: Tiwa Savage na Burna Boy ntibazoja muri Afrika y’Epfo kubera ubwicanyi ku banyamahanga
column3: Umuririmvyi rurangiranwa w'umunya Nigeria, Burna Boy, yarahiye ko atazosubira guhonyoza ikirenge muri Afrika y'Epfo, eka na mugenziwe Tiwa Savage ahagarika igiteramo yari afiseyo. Mu butumwa yacishije mu rubuga rwa Twitter, Burna Boy avuga ko yaheruka muri ico gihugu mu 2017, kandi ko atazosubirayo gushika leta ya Afika y'Epfo yisubiyeko. Tiwa Sawage nawe avuga ko ibiriko biraba bikomeye kandi ko atawungukira mu kumeneka kw'amaraso. Ati "kwica uwariwe wese w'umunyafrika bimuraba". Igipolisi c'ico gihugu carahagaritse abantu batari bake bari muri iyo migumuko imaze iminsi mu bisagara vya Johannesburg, Pretoria n'ahandi. Abantu bashika batanu baramaze kwicwa. Umukuru w'ico gihugu, Cyril Ramaphosa, n'abandi bakuru b'ibihugu vya Afrika bariyamiriza ivyo bitero. Umukuru w'igihugu ca Nigeria, Muhammadu Buhari, yarungitse intumwa muri Afrika y'Epfo itwaye "ubutumwa bwo kwerekana akababaro ku kuntu abanyagihugu baco bafashwe nabi". Umuririmvyi akomoka muri Nigeria azwi cane no muri Afrika, Tiwa Savage yanditse kuri Twitter ko yiyamirije yivuye inyuma ubwicanyi ku bantu b'iwe muri Afrika y'Epfo. Ati: "Kuri iyo mvo, sinshobora kuririmba mw'isabukuru rya DSTV ryimirije i Johannesburg ku wa 21 z'uku kwezi kw'icenda". Tiwa azwi cane mu ndirimbo nka "Eminado" na "All Over" amenyesha ko "kwica uwariwe wese w'umunyafrika bimuraba atarindiriye kuba umunyanigeria gusa". Mugenzi wiwe Burna Boy nawe akomoka muri Nigeria avuga ko ubwicanyi bushingiye ku rwanko ku banyamahanga buteye kubiri n'ivyo yarwaniye. Avuga ko Afrika yashigikiye abanya Afrika y'Epfo igihe bariko barwanya intwaro karyanishamiryango y'abazungu ya Apartheid kuva mu myaka ya 1960  gushika mu 1994 irangira. Burna Boy yanditse ati: "Ndatahura ko abanya Afrika y'Epfo bataye umutwe kubera imyaka bamaze bacurwa bufuni na buhoro, ku buryo basigaye bafata nk'abansi abantu babafashije mu gihe bariko bacurwa bufuni na buhoro, ahubwo  bagashimagiza ababahohoteye". Yongeyeko y'uko hari abanya Afrika y'Epfo "bameze neza, bafise ivyiyumviro birashe, n'aho atari benshi". Ishavu ryavuye kuri iyo migumuko ryatumye ishami rimwe ry'ikigo c'ubudandaji ca Afrika Afrika y'Epfo, Shoprite, giterwa kikanyagwa urukombamazi muri gisagara ca Lagos.

column2: Ingene ibintu bimeze muri Ukraine: Ubuzima i Mariupol buri mu minwe ya Putin – umukuru w’igisagara
column3: Mu kiganiro yagiranye n'itororokanirizo ry'amakuru Reuters, umukuru w'igisagara ca Mariupol Vadym Boychenko yavuze ko ubuzima bw'abanyagihugu bazibiriwe muri ico gisagara kigeze ahatemba buri mu minwe ya Perezida Vladimir Putin w'Uburusiya. Boychenko yerekanye akababaro kiwe ku bikorwa vyo guhungisha abantu i Mariupol kuva intambara itanguye. Avuga ko Uburusiya "bwaburijemwo iri hungisha", bari batanguye "mu misi ya mbere y'ukwezi kwa Ntwarante (3)". "Badusavye ko tubaha ikarata y'aho iri hungisha rizotangurira - twarabahaye ikarata. "Baratubajije igitigiri c'amamodoka dufise, turabaha igitigiri c'amamodoka. "Ariko barononye bongera barasambura ivyo bibanza vyose, barasambuye n'amamodoka yacu". Boychenko avuga ko hakiri abantu 100.000 bakizibiriwe muri ico gisagara mu gihe abasirikare bari mu ruganda rw'ivyuma rwa Azovstal batariko barishikana. Yongerako ati: "Ni ngombwa gutahura ko hari abagifise ubuzima bakiriyo, kandi buri mu minwe y'umuntu umwe rudende - Vladimir Putin". Kuri uwu wa gatanu, yateye akamo gashasha ko hoba ibikorwa vyo guhungisha abantu bose muri ico gisagara co mu bumanuko Perezida Putin avuga ko hafi cose kigenzurwa n'ingabo z'Uburusiya. "Dukeneye ikintu kimwe gusa - guhungisha abantu bose. Hafi 100.000 baracari i Mariupol", niko yavugiye ku mboneshakure y'igihugu, nk'uko vyandikwa na Reuters. Ejo ku wa kane, Putin yategetse ingabo ziwe kuzibira rwose akarwi ka nyuma k'abarwanyi ba Ukraine bakiri muri urwo ruganda rw'ivyuma. Mariupol imaze amezi abiri icucagirwa ibibombe vy'urutavanako kandi ata kintu na kimwe kirangwayo kuko Abarusiya bazibiye amayira y'imfungurwa, bakata amazi n'umuyagankuba. Vya muzinga nivyo bibandanya bikora mu ntambara yo mu buseruko bwa Ukraine. Nivyo vyaraye birasirana mw'ijoro ryakeye. Abanyamakuru bamaze ijoro bari ahitwa Sloviansk ku birometero birenga 20 uvuye ku rwasiro. Mu gihe bibazako bari ahantu hatekanye, inyuma y'isaha indwi z'ijoro, bavyuwe n'ikibombe c'Uburusiya caturitse cane batari banaciteze, bica biba ngombwa ko bahungira mu nzu yo mu kuzimu. Bukeye bihweje ivyononekaye, aho basanze ibibombe vyaguye ku metero 200 y'abo bari binyegeje. Intsinga zitwara umuyagankuba zari hasi, vyumvikana ko ata muyagankuba uhari. Uko niko ibintu bimeze mu bisagara vy'intara ya Donbas. Ingabo z'Uburusiya zibandanya zugariza Kharkiv, nk'uko bivugwa n'igisirikare ca Ukraine kuri uwu wa gatanu. Ingabo z'Uburusiya zariko zigerageza kumenera mu bumanuko zivuye mu gisagara ca Izyum kiri mu ntara ya Kharkiv, kugira ngo zizingurize ingabo za Ukraine ziri mu ntara ya Donbas, nk'uko igisirikare ca Ukraine kibivuga. Mu bice vyose vy'ubuseruko, ingabo z'Uburusiya zongereje akariro muri ano masaha 24 arangiye, cane cane mu turere twa Zarechny, Rubezhny, Popasnaya, Novotoshkovsky na Marinka, nk'uko kibandanya kibivuga. Ukraine ivuga ko yakoroye indege 15 z'Uburusiya mu masaha 24 aheze. BBC ntishobora guhinyuza aya makuru. Uburusiya buvuga ko bwateye ibibanza 58 vya gisirikare muri Ukraine mw'ijoro ryakeye, harimwo ivyari vyuzuyemwo ingabo, ibitoro n'ibikoresho vya gisirikare, nk'uko bivugwa n'ubushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi bw'Uburusiya. Buvuga kandi ko bwateye ibibanza bitatu vya gisirikare bikoresha ibisasu vya misire bidahusha, harimwo misire S-300 ya Ukraine irasa indege, ivyo bibanza kandi bikaba vyari vyuzuye ingabo nyinshi za Ukraine zifise n'ibikoresho vyazo. BBC ntishobora guhinyuza aya makuru. Umushikiranganji wa mbere w'Ubwongereza Boris Johnson yamenyesheje ko ingabo za Ukraine ziri mu Bwongereza mu nyigisho z'ukungene bakoresha imodoka z'intambara iki gihugu gitanga mu ntumbero yo kwirukana ingabo z'Uburusiya. Ari ku rugendo atera aja mu Buhindi, yabwiye abanyamakuru bari kumwe ati: "Ndashobora kumenyesha ko turiko turigisha abanya Ukraine muri Pologne ingene bakoresha ibikoresho vyo gukorora indege, mu Bwongereza naho tukabigisha ingene bakoresha imodoka z'intambara". Umunyamabanga ajejwe kumenyesha amakuru mu biro kwa Johnson avuga ko abanya-Ukraine "baharurwa muri mirongo" bari mu Bwongereza mu nyigisho. Ingabo za Ukraine zatanguye inyigisho ku modoka z'intambara zatanzwe n'Ubwongereza muri kuno kwezi, nk'uko bivugwa n'umuvugizi wa Johnson. Uyo muvugizi avuga ko Ubwongereza n'incuti zabwo bariko baraha abasirikare ba Ukraine ibikoresho vy'ubwoko bushasha bashobora kuba batari bwigere bakoresha imbere y'aha. Avuga ati: "Birumvikana ko baronswa inyigisho nkenerwa z'ingebe bikoreshwa. Igihe cose twama tuzi ikintu ico ari co cose gishobora gutuma ibintu vyunyuka ariko ibintu biratomoye neza ko igituma ibintu vyunyuka ubu ari intwaro ya Putin".

column2: Ukraine: 'ntihagire ikindi mugurira muri Russia kiretse umwavu n’ingano' - niko US igabisha Africa
column3: Uwuserukira Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mw’ishirahamwe ONU  yaragendeye ibihugu vya Afrika, kimwe mu vya mugenza, kwari ukugabisha ko bitohirahira ngo bigurire ikintu kindi mu Burusiya kiretse intete n’umwavu, anagabisha ko bishobora gufatirwa ibihano. Mu kiganiro n’abanyamakuru i Kampala muri Uganda, Linda Thomas-Greenfield yavuze ati:  “Uburusiya bwama buvuga ngo ibihano bwafatiwe ku mfungurwa no ku bindi bifitaniye isano n’uburimyi vyatumye ibiciro biduga mu bihugu bitari bike. [...] Nagomba kumenyesha ko ata bihano twafatiwe ibintu ivyo ari vyo vyose vy’uburimyi biva mu Burusiya. “Uburusiya burashobora gushora hanze ibidandazwa vyabwo vyo mu gisata c’uburimyi, harimwo umwavu n’ingano, kandi n’ibindi bihugu birashobora kubigura”. “Nayo ku bihano vyafatiwe Uburusiya”, niko Linda Thomas-Greenfield abandanya avuga, “nk’akarorero ku bitoro, mu gihe igihugu cofata ingingo yo gukorana n’Uburusiya mu bisata bwafatiwemwo ibihano, aho coba gihonyanze ibi bihano[…].  Aha rero tugabisha ibihugu ko bitohirahira ngo birenge kuri ibi bihano”. Ibihugu hafi vyose vya Afrika bishima kutegamira kuri Ukraine muri ino ntambara yayo n’Uburusiya. Ibi mu bisanzwe bisigurwa n’ukutagirira icizere Uburengero, imyaka vyamaze mu bukoloni, be n’impuhwe z’incabwenge mu bihugu bitari bike vya Afrika zize mu Burusiya. Aho nyene, ibihugu bimwe bimwe vya Afrika ni abakiriya bakomeye b’intete za Ukraine, bakaba bahanzwe n’ikibazo c’ubukene bw’imfungurwa kigenda ciyongera. Ni mu gihe ku rubuga, intambara zibandanya ziha inkumbi muri Ukraine. Mu turere tw’intara ya Donetsk tugenzurwa na Ukraine, abasivire batanu baraye bishwe n’ingabo z’Uburusiya, nk’uko bivugwa n’umukuru wa gisirikare muri Donetsk Pavel Kirilenko. Yanditse ku rubuga rwa Telegram ati: "Kw’igenekerezo rya 5 Myandagaro (5), Abarusiya bishe abasivire batanu ba Donbass. Abandi 14 barakomeretse”. Ni mu gihe hari amakuru avuga ko hari igice kigira kabiri c’imfashanyo Amerika iha Ukraine gifise agaciro k’umuriyaridi umwe cimirije gutangwa. Isoko ryabwiye Reuters ko ibiro vy’umukuru w’igihugu wa Amerika mu ndwi iza - ari nko ku wa mbere – bizotangaza iyindi mfashanyo ingana n’umuriyaridi w’amadorari y’abanyamerika izorungikirwa Ukraine. Muri ino mfashanyo harimwo ibisasu vya za muzinga zitera ibisasu vyinshi, zizwi nka HIMARS, ibirwanisho vyo gukorora indege vyo mu bwoko bwa NASAMS, hamwe n’ibimodoka ntamenwa vyo m ugisata c’ubuvuzi, bizwi nka 50 M113. Perezida Joe Biden ntaratera igikumu kuri uru rupapuro, bikaba bishoboka ko ibigize iyi mfashanyo, ibi navyo bikaba ari ibitigiri hamwe n’ubwoko bw’ibirwanisho, bishobora guhinduka. Mu gihe Biden yoterako igikumu, iyi yoba ari yo mfashanyo nini cane itangiwe icarimwe ihabwa Ukraine kuva intambara itanguye. Amerika imaze kurungikira Ukraine imfashanyo y’agaciro k’imiriyaridi 8.8 igizwe n’ibirwanisho n’ibindi vya nkenerwa. Maison Blanche/White House yanse kugira ico ishikirije ku vyerekeye iyi mfashanyo yimirije.

column2: Ethiopia: Umusigiti wa mbere muri Africa, al-Nejashi, wasambuye n'ibibombe muri Tigray
column3: Reta ya Ethiopia yemeye ko igiye gusanura umusigiti wa kera cane wasambuwe mu kwezi guheze mu ntambara ya Tigray mu buraruko bw'ico gihugu. Umusigiti wa al-Nejashi uvugwa ko watewe ibibombe, ivyari muri wo biranyagwa, eka mbere n'imva z'abategetsi b'idini rya Isilamu bo muri kahise zirononekara. Reta ivuga ko n'urusengero rwasambuwe muri ico gihe c'intambara na rwo nyene ruzosanurwa. Abanyagihugu baba muri ako karere bazi ko umugisiti wa al-Nejashi wubatswe n'Aba-Isilamu ba mbere bimukiye muri Afrika mu gihe c'Intumwa Muhammad. Bari bahunze amabi bariko barakorerwa i Makka baca bahabwa ubuhungiro mu cahoze ari ubwami bwa Aksum. Aba-Isilamu bo muri ako karere bazi ko abasangirangendo 15 b'Intumwa Muhammad bahambwe muri izova zasambuwe . Bazi kandi  ko uwo musigiti ari wo wa mbere watanguye kwubakwa muri Afrika, n'aho hari abandi bavuga ko uwa mbere wubatswe muri Afrika uri muri Misiri. Uwo musigiti uri mu gisagara ca Wukro kiri ku birometero hafi 800 uvuye ku mugwa mukuru wa Ethiopia, Addis Ababa. Urusengero Emanueli Mweranda (Saint Emmanuel) rw'Abakristu b'idini rya Orthodoxe na rwo nyene rwarasambuwe ariko nta nsiguro zatanzwe. Mu mwaka wa 2015 hari ishirahamwe ryo muri Turukiya ryatanguje ibikorwa vyo gusanura uwo musigiti, rivuga ko ryashaka "kubungabunga uwo mutungo wo muri kahise", rigahindura ako karere kugira ngo gashobore kwirukirwa n'ingenzi. Uwu musigiti hamwe n'urusengero rwari hafi yawo vyasambuye mu bitero vya gisirikare vyamaze ukwezi kumwe  bifise intumbero yo kwomora ubutegetsi bw'umugambwe Tigray People's Liberation Front (TPLF) wari urongoye akarere ka Tigray. Ishirahamwe ryigenga ry'Ububirigi rikorera muri Afrika rivuga ko ku wa 18 z'ukwa cumi na kabiri uwo musigiti wa al-Nejashi "wabanje guterwa ibombe mu nyuma unyagwa urukombamazi n'abasirikare ba Ethiopia na Eritrea". Iryo shirahamwe rivuga kandi ko ibinyamakuru vya Tigray vyatangaje ko abantu batari bake bishwe bariko bagerageza gukingira uwo musigiti. Reta ntaco irashikiriza kuri ivyo vyegeranyo vy'iryo shirahamwe. Ariko, reta za Ethiopia na Eritrea zompi zirahakana ko hari abasirikare ba  Eritrea bari muri Tigray gufasha mu ntambara yo kurwanya TPLF. Mu kiganiro yagiranye na BBC igisata ca Amharic, icegera c'umukuru w'igisata kijejwe gukingira umurage wo muri kahise, Abebaw Ayalew, yavuze ko ko komite idasanzwe izoshikanwa muri ako karere kugira ngo yige ingene uwo musigiti n'urwo rusengero vyasambuwe imbere y'uko ibikorwa vyo gusanura bitangura. Ati: "Ubu burere ntibuzwi gusa ku bijanye n'ugusenga, ariko kandi ni umutungo wo muri kahise kuri Ethiopia yose". Mu ntango z'ukw'icumi na rimwe, intambara yaradutse mu karere ka Tigray igihe umushikiranganji wa mbere wa Ethiopia, Abiy Ahmed, yagomora ingabo mu ntumbero yo gutuza abarwanyi ba TPLF. Hari haciye amezi atari make hari ukutumvikana hagati ya reta ya Abiy n'abategetsi ba TPLF, umugambwe wari urongoye Tigray.

column2: Amakuru avugwa ahandi kw'isi kuri Covid-19
column3: Ikompanyi y'u Bushinwa ihingura imiti, Sinopharm, itangaza ko yiteze kuba yakoze urucanco imbere 'yuko uyu mwaka urangira. Umukuru w'iyi kompanyi, Liu Jingzhen, yabwiye abanyamakuru ko uru rucanco ubu rugeze ku ntambwe ya gatatu rugeragezwa kandi ko ruzoshobora kuja kw'isoko imbere 'y'uko ukwa cumi  na kabiri kurangira. Gushika ubu incanco zirenga 200 ziriko zirageragezwa kw'isi, kandi izirenga 20 ubu ziri ku ntambwe yo kugeragerezwa ku bantu. OMS/WHO igabisha ko 'incanco ziriko zigunganywa n'ibihugu bimwe' Iki kiza kiriko kirunyurwa n'uko hari ibihugu biriko birigungana urucanco rwa Covid-19, nk'uko bivugwa n'ishami ryitaho amagara y'abantu kw'isi. Mu nama yakorewe ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi, Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus, umukuru wa OMS,  yavuze ati: "Muri kino gihe, igikenewe ni uko ibihugu vyose bikorera hamwe ku nyungu za buri gihugu - mu gihe hazoba hari uwudatekaniwe, nta n'umwe azoba atekaniwe". "Dukeneye kurwanya ko urucanco rwa Covid-19 rwigunganwa n'ibihugu kanaka". Urukino rwa mbere rwo kwugurura ihiganwa ry'umupira w'amaguru mu Bufaransa, Ligue 1 rwari rutegekanijwe kuri uyu wa gatanu rwungururijwe ku wa 16 canke 17 z'ukw'icenda. Iyo ngingo ifashwe inyuma y'aho hari abandi bakinyi batatu ba Olympique de Marseille (OM) batangajwe ko banduye umugera, bakaba babaye bane bo muri uyo murwi banduye, vyumvikana ko urukino rwari rutegekanijwe n'umurwi wa Saint Etienne vyabaye ngombwa ko rwunguruzwa. Brezili ni kimwe mu bihugu bibangamiwe n'ikiza ca coronavirus, aho abamaze kuwandura baharurwa mu miliyoni zitatu n'inusu, nayo abarenga 100.000 bamaze gupfa. Umukuru w'ico gihugu Jair Bolsonaro yafashe minenerwe ingaruka z'iki kiza, aho yagifashe n'ibicurane bisanzwe. Mu kiganiro na BBC, icegera c'umukuru w'igihugu, Hamilton Mourão, yashigikiye ingendo yafashwe na leta, avuga ko n'aho igihugu catakaje abanyagihugu baco, leta iriko irakora igikorwa gikomeye. Abandanya avuga ko ubugaba buri mu banyabrezili aribwo bwatumye ingingo zo gutandukana zidakurikizwa. Abantu ibihumbi n'ibihumbi muri Argentine birengagije ingingo za guma mu rugo ku mugwa mukuru Buenos Aires  baja mu myiyerekano yo kwiyamiriza leta ejo ku wa mbere. No mu bindi bisagara kwari uko. Abari muri iyo myiyerekano bari bafise uburakari, bamwe biyamiriza ingene leta yafashe iki kiza. Leta y'ico gihugu yarafashe ingingo za guma mu rugo kuva ku wa 20 z'ukwa gatatu, ariko zikaba zagiye ziratezurwa mu gihugu hagati, ariko umukuru w'ico gihugu Alberto Fernández akaba yarakomeje izo ngingo ku mugwa mukuru Buenos Aires no mu micungararo yaho gushika ku wa 30 z'uku kw'umunani.

column2: Ghana: Abashingamateka barwanye bapfa ikori ku mahera aca ku materefone ngendanwa
column3: Hadutse imishamirano mu nama nshingamateka ya Ghana mw'ijoro ryo kuwa mbere buca ari ku wa kabiri igihe abashingamateka bariko biga ikori ryotangwa ku mafaranga acishwa ku materefone ngendanwa. Abashingamateka barateranye inkokora, barasunagurana, bahana amangumi, mu gihe abandi nabo bagerageza kubanguranya. Iyi mishamirano yadutse igihe abashingamateka bo ku ruhande rutavuga rumwe n'umugambwe uri ku butegetsi bahaguruka bakaja kubuza icegera c'umukuru w'inama nshingamateka Joseph Osei Owusu ko ahaguruka ngo aje gutora, nk'uko bivugwa n'ibinyamakuru vyo muri ico gihugu. Niwe yari arongoye ino nama yahavuye yunguruzwa kubera uru ruhagarara. Umugambwe National Democratic Congress (NDC) utavuga rumwe n'uwuri ku butegetsi uriyamiriza iri kori ringana na 1.75% ku mafaranga acishwa ku materefone ngendanwa, harimwo no kuriha ibicuruzwa ukoresheje terefone ngendanwa. Uyu mugambwe uvuga ko iri kori rizohohotera abadafise amikoro manini hamwe n'abo bose bari hanze y'igisata c'amabanki. Ariko umushikiranganji w'ikigega ca reta Ken Ofori-Artta avuga ko ari ukwagura igisata c'abatangakori, agasigura ko mu mwaka uza igihugu gishobora kuhungukira imiriyaridi 6.9 z'amafaranga y'ama cedi akoreshwa muri Ghana (yababa hafi imiriyaridi 1.15 y'amadorari y'abanyamerika). Iri koraniro ry'inama nshingamateka ryatanguye ku wa mbere mu gatondo, rikaba ryagiye guhagarikwa inyuma y'isaha zitandatu z'ijoro (canke saa sita z'ijoro), nk'uko bivugwa n'ikinyamakuru Graphic co muri ico gihugu. Iki kinyamakuru cacishije ku rubuga rwa Twitter iyi reresi y'uru ruhagarara. BBC ntibazwa ibivuye ku zindi mbuga. Abanya-Ghana batari bake bagaye iyi nyifato y'abashingamateka babo, bakavuga ko bategerezwa kubera akarorero keza abandi - hakwifata nk'abana. Ijwi ry'icegera c'umukuru w'inama nshingamateka ryaboneka ko ari kirumara mu gihe inama nshingamateka yacanyemwo bikomeye kubera integuro y'iri kori. Ava mu mugambwe uri ku butegetsi New Patriotic Party (NPP). Umugambwe NDC uvuga ko atategerezwa gutora kubera yari arongoye inama. Ikinyamakuru Graphic kivuga ko integuro y'tegeko rigenga iri kori yemejwe n'umurwi w'inama nshingamateka ujejwe ikigega, ku majwi 13 kuri 12, ariko ni inyuma y'aho umukuru w'uyu murwi atangiye ijwi ryiwe ryabanguranije. Inama nshingamateka yasubiye gukorana kandi ejo ku wa kabiri, ariko abashingamateka ntibatoye iri tegeko inyuma y'aho bumvikaniye ko inama yungururizwa mu kwa mbere. Poritike ya Ghana irangwamwo ukutumvikana kuva mu mwaka uheze, inyuma y'amatora aho imigambwe NDC na NPP yaronse intebe 137 umwe umwe. Intebe imwe ni iy'uwigenga, yagiye ku ruhande rwa NPP, agatuma uwu mugambwe uronka akarusho. Mu kwa mbere, abasirikare barinjiye mu nama nshingamateka kugira bahagarike imishamirano hagati y'abashingamateka yadutse bagomba gutora umukuru w'inama nshingamateka. Ico gihe, Alban Bagbin wa NDC niwe yatowe inyuma y'aho bamwe mu bashingamateka ba NPP bamuhereye amajwi bakayima uwo mu mugambwe wabo, Mike Oquaye. Bagbin ntiyari muri iyi nama yo kuwa mbere yadutsemwo uru ruhagarara, ari co gituma yaciye irongorwa na Owusu wo muri NPP.
