column2: Mali: Macron yatangaje ivanwa ry'ingabo inyuma y'imyaka icenda muri ico gihugu
column3: Ubufaransa n'ibihugu bifatanije mu ngabo za Buraya bigiye kuvana ingabo zavyo muri Mali inyuma y'imyaka hafi cumi, nk'uko vyatangajwe na prezida Emmanuel Macron. Izo ngabo zari zimaze iyo myaka ziri mu  rugamba rwo kurwanya intagondwa z'aba Islam muri ico gihugu kuva mu 2013. Prezida Macron yavuze ko ingingo yo kuva muri ico gihugu  yatewe n'itituka ry'imigenderanire, mu gihe akagawi k'abasirikare bafashe ubutegetsi muri Mali kabandanya kugaragaza ko katerekwa Ubufaransa. Izo ngabo zica zirungikwa mu bindi bihugu vy'ako karere ka Sahel. Mu kiganiro n'abamenyeshamakuru i Paris ku wa kane, prezida Macron yavuze ati: "Ntidushobora kubandanya turi mu bikorwa vya gisirikare dukorana n'abantu bihariye ubutegetsi, bafise imikenyuro n'imigambi yinyegeje tutemera". Yahakanye ibivugwa ko kuva muri Mali ari ukwemera ko bananiwe aca ashimika avuga ko Ubufaransa buzoguma mu gikorwa co kurwanya ibikorwa vy'intagondwa z'aba Islam muri ako karere. Yamenyesheje ko igihugu ca Niger cemeye kwakira zimwe muri izo ngabo zizoba zikuwe muri Mali. Yavuze ati: "Ubufaransa bwagize uruhara rwo guhuriza hamwe inguvu  muri ico gikorwa mpuzamakungu co gufasha Sahel. "Tuzobandanya urwo ruhara rwo guhuriza hamwe". Igikorwa co kuvanayo izo ngabo, gitegekanijwe kumara ikiringo kiri hagati y'amezi ane n'amezi atandatu, catangajwe inyuma y'inama y'abategetsi ba Buraya na Afrika ku biro vy'umukuru w'igihugu c'Ubufaransa, Champs Élysée, ku wa gatatu mw'ijoro. Mw'itangazo ryasohotse kuri uyu wa kane mu gitondo, ibihugu bifise uruhara mu mugwi wa Tabuka urongowe n'Ubufaransa rivuga ko bumvikanye ko gushika mu kwezi kwa gatandatu hazoba hashizweho imigambi yo kuguma bafasha  muri ako karere, na cane cane muri Niger no mu bihugu vy'ikigobe ca Guinee. Hafi ingabo 5.000 z'abafaransa ziri mu butumwa bwo kurwanya intangondwa z'aba Islam muri Sahel mu gikorwa kizwi nka Barkhane, izishika 2.400 zikaba ziri mu makambi atatu mu buraruko bwa Mali. Iyo karata iri aho munsi irerekana akarere ka Sahel n'ibihugu karimwo Ariko imigenderanire y'Ubufaransa na Mali, kimwe mu bihugu bikenye cane kw'isi, yaratitutse cane muri iyi minsi kuva igisirikare gifashe igihugu mw'itembagazwa ry'unbutegetsi ryabaye mu kwezi kw'umunani mu 2020. Ibintu vyunyutse kuruta mu kwezi guheze igihe abo basirikare bisubirako ku mwumvikano bari bemeye wo gutunganya amatora mu kwezi kwa kabiri hanyuma bakavuga ko bazoguma ku butegetsi gushika mu 2025, mu nyuma bagahava bakirukana uwuserukira Ubufaransa. Mu kwezi kwa 12, ibihugu birenga 10 vyo mu Burengerazuba vyiyamirije kandi  umuzo w'abacangero b'umugwi ushingiye mu Burusiya wa Wagner muri Mali. Uwo mugwi umaze kugira uruhara mu ntambara zitari nke zikomeye mu bihugu nka Syria, Mozambique, Sudan na Centrafrique. Amatohoza ya BBC yerekanye ko uwo mugwi ufise aho uhuriye n'ivyaha vyo mu ntambara muri Libya. Macron yagabishije avuga ko uwo mugwi waje "gukingira inyungu zawo n'iz'abari ku butegetsi ubwabo". Inkuru y'uko Ubufaransa bukuye akarenge ntiyakiriwe kumwe muri Mali. Umugabo umwe yabwiye BBC ko ivyo "bizozana amahoro mu buraruko bw'igihugu cacu kuko Uburusiya na Wagner ata nkeka ko bazoshigikira ingabo zacu", mu gihe uwundi yavuze ko  ingabo z'Ubufaransa muri Mali zananiwe. Ariko hari abandi bashikirije amakenga ko ibintu biriko birunyuka. Umwe mu bafise impungenge yabwiye BBC ati: "Ejo harabaye igitero  mu gice c'uburaruko bwa Mali... Abasirikare bacu bari mu gice co hagati. Bavuga ko ingabo ziriko zirigarurira uturere. Ariko aho ni mu majahagati y'igihugu gusa. Mu zindi ntara ho gute?" Ivanwa ry'ingabo z'Ubufaransa muri Mali rizogira ingaruka z'umutekano ku bindi bihugu vyo mu karere ka Sahel  navyo nyene bisanzwe bihanzwe n'intagomdwa za Islam. Umukuru wa Côte d'Ivoire Alassane Ouattara yagabishije ko iyo ngingo izosiga igihengeri kizosaba utundi twigoro ama reta y'ibihugu vyo mu karere. Ouattara ati: "Bizodusaba kwongereza ingabo kandi turushirizeho gukingira imbibe zacu." Ariko umukuru wa Senegal Macky Sall avuga ko atahura igituma Ubufaransa bwafashe ingingo yo kuva muri Mali, kandi yizeza ko urugamba rwo kurwanya intagondwa za Islam muri Sahel  ruzokomeza. Hagati aho umukuru wa Ghana  Nana Akufo-Addo yavuze ko ari nkenerwa cane ko ingabo za ONU ziguma zikora muri Mali n'ubwo Ubufaransa buvuyeyo. Umuvugizi wa ONU yavuze ati uko bigenda kwose hazoba "ingaruka ku bikorwa." Hari n'amakenga kuri kazoza k'intumwa za Buraya zo kwigisha abasirikare muri Mali , inyuma y'aho umushikiranganji w'Ubudagi ajejwe  kwivuna abansi Christine Lambrecht  avugiye ko  ata cizere afise ko Ubudagi buzobandanya ubwo butumwa. Yavuze ati: "Twamenye  ingingo y'Ubufaransa yo kuva  kuva muri Mali no kurangiza ubutumwa bwabwo muri ico gihugu, ingingo ata nkeka izogira ingaruka kubo bari bafatanije ubutumwa."

column2: Papa Bouba Diop yahoze akinira Senegal n'imirwi yo mu Bwongereza yapfuye ku myaka 42
column3: Papa Bouba Diop yahoze akina hagati mu murwi nserukiragihugu wa Senegal, be no mu mirwi ya Fulham na Portsmouth yapfuye afise imyaka 42. Diop yakinye inkino 129 mw'ihiganwa ry'Ubwongereza Premier League, mbere akaba yaranakiniye n'imirwi ya West Ham United na Birmingham City mu Bwongereza. Diop yarakiniye umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Senegal mw'igihanwa ry'igikombe c'isi mu 2002, akaba ari we yinjije igitsindo catumye iki gihugu gitsinda Ubufaransa 1-0. Fifa yanditse ku mbuga hwaniro iti: "Warabaye intwari mu gikombe c'isi, uzokwama uri intwari". Ubutumwa bw'umurwi Fulham yacishije ku rubuga rwa Twitter, buvuga ko uyu murwi "wababaye cane". Iki gihe Senegal ija muri rino higanwa ry'igikombe c'isi mu 2002, niho yashika mu gice ca kane gishira ica nyuma, Diop akaba yashoboye kwinjiza ibitsindo bibiri mu rukino rwo gukuranamwo rwayihuje na Uruguay, rukarangira ari 3-3. Yakiniye kandi Senegal mu mahiganwa ane y'igikombe ca Afrika, harimwo igihe Senegal irangiza ihiganwa ari iya kabiri mu 2002. Diop yasezeye mu mupira w'amaguru mu 2013. Diop yarafashije umurwi wa Portsmouth gutwara igikombe ca FA mu 2008, igihe wari usanzwe umenyerezwa na Harry Redknapp. Redknapp yabwiye iradiyo BBC Radio 5 Live ati: "Yari umuntu ameze neza cane". "Yambereye umuntu mwiza cane, umuntu w'imico ikomeye, yama anezerewe kandi yarangwa n'akamwemwe mu maso. Yari umuntu w'igihangange". "Nta mutima mubi yari afise. N'aho yaboneka ko umengo ateye ubwoba mu kibuga kuko yari afise igihagararo kinini, nta kabi kari muri we". "Nifatanije n'umuryango wiwe". Umukuru w'igihugu ca Senegal, Macky Sall,  avuga ko urupfu rwa Diop "ari incamugongo kuri Senegal", nayo Sadio Mane akina hagati muri Liverpool yanditse ku rubuga rwa Instagram ati: "Papa Bouba, Turababaye cane twumvise urupfu rwawe. Tukwemereye ko uzoguma mu mitima yacu n'aho ugiye utadusezeye".

column2: Swiss bemeje kubuza kwamamaza itabi inyuma cane y'ibihugu bibanyi
column3: Aba-Swisse batoye bemeza kubuza kwamamaza itabi ahantu hose abakiri bato bashobora kubibona. Mu vy'ukuri, kuba Ego ariyo yiganje muri ayo matora ya kamarampaka mu gihugu cose bizotuma kwamamaza itabi bicibwa burundu. Ivyo bizotuma Swisse ija ku murongo w'ibindi bihugu bibanyi vy'i Buraya, vyinshi vyashitse ku ngingo zikomeye zibuza canke zigabanya kwamamaza itabi haraheze imyaka itari mike. N'ubwo ari igihugu gisanzwe kizwi neza ku bijanye n'amagara meza n'ugukingira ibidukikije, Swisse yari igifise amwe mu mategeko yerekeye itabi  yoroshe cane i Buraya. Mu gihe haheze imyaka myinshi kunywera itabi mu nzu z'uburiro n'ubunywero vyari vyaraciwe mu Bwongereza, mu Bufaransa, canke mu Budagi, muri Swisse bari bakihanywera itabi. Mu masoko ya kijambere (supermarches/supermartkets), abariko barasuma hari igihe bakirwa n'abagore bakiri bato babamwenyurira mu gihe babaha imponjo za gusa z'itabi riba riherutse gusohoka. Mu gihe ivyo haheze imyaka bibujijwe, kwamamaza itabi vyari bikibandanya. Ashima ivyavuye mu matora yo ku wa mungu, umushingamateka w'umu-social democrat  Flavia Wasserfallen yakeje igikorwa c'amashirahamwe y'abaganga n'abigisha bakoze isekeza ryo guca ivyo kwamamaza itabi. Yabwiye television ya Swisse ati: "Abantu barakoze cane kugira haboneke  poritike yo gushira imbere ineza y'abakiri bato". Ingingo z'ishami rya ONU riraba amagara kw'isi OMS zijanye n'itabi  - Framework Convention on Tobacco Control- zimaze imyaka hafi 20 zishitsweko mu gisagara ca Geneve. Swisse yarazishizeko umukono, ariko ntiyari bwazemeze mu mategeko -kikaba arico gihugu ca Buraya co nyene cari gisigaye - kuko gushika habe amatora yo ku wa mungu, amategeko y'ico gihugu yerekeye kwamamaza, ntiyisunga izo ngingo. Ugereranije no mu bindi bihugu vy'i Buraya, itabi muri Swisse rirazimbutse kandi 27% y'abantu bakuze muri ico gihugu baranywa itabi - urugero ruri hejuru y'urw'i Buraya muri rusangi. Ni kenshi amategeko agamije kugabanya canke guca kwamamaza itabi yari amaze kunanirwa kurengana mu nama nshingamateka. N'igihe abagira isekeza baba baronse imikono ikwiye yo gusaba ko haba amatora kamarampaka yo guca kwamamaza, reta yaca ibwira abanyagihugu gutora Oya. Abashigikiye ko kwamamaza bicibwa, bavugako ivyo biterwa n'uko muri ico gihugu hariyo amwe mu ma kompanyi akomeye cane kw'isi mu rudandazwa rw'itabi. Philip Morris, British American Tobacco na Japan Tobacco yose afise ivyicaro vyayo bikuru muri Swisse. Urudandazwa rw'itabi bigereranywa ko rwinjiriza ubutunzi bwa Swisse amafaranga arenga miriyaridi 6 z'amadorari ku mwaka, rugakoresha abantu 11.000 muri ico gihugu. Imbere y'uko amatora aba vyaragaragaye ko -nk'uko benshi bavyikeka - ko ama kompanyi y'itabi yahora asuka amafaranga mw'isekeza ryo gutora Oya. Abagwanya ko hacibwa kwamamaza, bavuga ko kubuza kwamamaza ikintu cemewe n'amategeko bidakwiye kwemerwa, kandi ko ivyo vyokwugururira imyango  ingingo ku bindi bicuruzwa, nk'isukari n'inzoga, navyo bibonwa nk'ibibangamira amagara y'abantu. Ivyapa biriko  zimwe mu mfungurwa aba-Swisse bakunda cane - vyerekanywe vyandiseko amajambo y'igabisha rikomeye ngo "ibi ni vyo bizoca bikurikira". Ariko abitavye amatora ivyo ntaco vyababwiye. Muri Swisse haharurwa abantu bashika 9.000 bapfa buri mwaka bahitanywe n'indwara zifatiye kw'itabi kandi  igisata c'amagara y'abantu gisohora amafaranga menshi yo kuvura bene izo ndwara. Biduza kandi amafaranga y'ubwishingizi, uwariwe wese ategerezwa gutanga, yaba anywa canke atanywa itabi. Imbere y'uko amatora aba, ibiharuro vyo kugereranya amajwi vyerekana ko 60% bari gushigikira  guca kwamamaza. Amaherezo babaye 56%, ariko n'ubundi bagumanye ubwiganze buhagije. Stefanie de Borba wo nw'ishirahamwe rya Swisse ryo kurwanya cancer yabwiye AFP ati: "Abantu baratahuye ko amagara ahambaye kuruta inyungu z'ubutunzi." Ubundi muri Swisse iyo abatora badatahura neza ico bahamagariwe gutora, baca bakurikiza impanuro ya reta. Ku yandi mategeko abiri bari bahamagariwe kwerekana aho bahagaze co kimwe no kuri iryo ryo guca kwamamaza itabi, reta yari yabahanuye gutora Oya, yamara yaratsinzwe. Ubu  abagize reta bakeneye akanya ko kwisuzuma niba bakiri ku murongo umwe n'abatora. Nk'uko umwe mu bandika uko babona ibintu aho muri Swisse yabivuze ku wa mungu: "Hageze guhitamwo hagati y'ubwigenge bw'ubutunzi n'amagara, abatora benshi bahisemwo ico ca nyuma…Haba uguca ukwamamaza, guca kunywa itabi canke itabi rizimvye, kunywa itabi ubu ntibigifise uruvugiro mu banyagihugu -bitandukanye no mu banyeporitike."

column2: SA: Jonas Gwangwa, umunyamuziki wa jazz yahanganye n'intwaro karyanishamiryango, apartheid
column3: Umuziki wa Afria y'Epfo no kw'isi nzima watakaje igihangange inyuma y'urupfu rw'uyu mucuraranzi  Jonas Gwangwa wo mu mudiho wa jazz yakoresha itarumbeta. Uyu mucuraranzi yapfuye ku wa 23 z'uku kwa mbere afise imyaka 83, akaba yahitanywe n'indwara y'umutima. N'aho imyaka myinshi y'ubuzima bwiwe yayimaze mu buhungiro, Gwangwa ntiyamenyekanye cane ku muziki wiwe gusa, azwi ko yagize uhurara rudasanzwe mu kurwanya bwa butegetsi karyanishamiryango bw'inkehwa z'abazungu muri Afrika y'Epfo. Gwangwa yavukiye mu karere ka Soweto mu gisagara ca Johannesburg  ku wa 19 z'ukwa cumi 1937, akaba yamaze imyaka irenga 60 mu muziki watumye amenyekana cane. Muri ico gihe yarumvise akamo yari atewe na Oliver Tambo yari arongoye ANC, kugira ngo arongore umurwi wiswe Amandla. Uyu murwi wari washinzwe mu myaka ya 1980 kugira ngo werekane uruhande rworoshe mu rugamba rwo kurwanya intwaro karyanishamiryango ya apartheid, ukaba warashigikiwe cane mu mpande zitandukanye z'isi. Reta y'umugambwe w'inkehwa z'abazungu, National Party, yabona ko ibikorwa vy'umuziki n'ukurwanira akaranga vya Gwangwa nk'ikibazo gikomeye cane ku nzego z'umutekano, maze zica zitera ibibombe ku nzu yiwe muri Botswana mu 1985. Imana yose ni uko uyu nyakwigendera hamwe n'abandi bose bari basanzwe baba muri iyo nzu ata n'umwe yari ahari. Ukwitanga kwiwe mu rugamba rwo kwibohoza hamwe n'impano idasanzwe mu bijanye n'umuziki vyatumye Gwangwa ahabwa agashimwe kitwa  Ikhamanga in Gold - agashimwe ko ku krwego rwo hejuru mu gihugu. Aka gashimwe yaronse mu 2010 kibutsa ingene "yabaye rurangiranwa kw'isi yose mu buhinga bwiwe nk'umunyatugenegene. Mu myaka irenga 30, yazungurutse isi yose aterwa amashurwe aho yaca hose". Mw'ijambo ryiwe ryo gusezera Jonas Gwangwa, Perezida Cyril Ramaphosa  yasohoye itangazo aho avuga ko "yinjiye mu murwi w'abanyamuziki bakomeye muri kahise kacu, baranzwe n'ubuhinga bukomeye hamwe n'ukwitangira uburenganzira bw'abanya Afrika y'Epfo bose - kandi bagahimiriza isi yose kurwanya intwaro karyanishamiryango ya apartheid". Thabo Mbeki yahoze arongoye igihugu nawe yashimiye uyu mucuraranzi ati: "Kuva mu ntango y'umwuga wiwe, Bra JG, nk'uko yari akunzwe kwitwa mu cubahiro bamuha, yaratahuye akamaro kadasanzwe ko kuvanga akaranga n'utugenegene nk'ikirwanisho nyaco mu rugamba rwo kuhabuza igihugu". "Afadikanije n'abandi bo mu runganwe rwiwe, Gwangwa yarakoresheje inguvu z'umuziki, atari gusa kuryohera abantu, ariko kandi aba icirore c'abanyagihugu yongera aragaragariza isi yose amabi y'ubutegetsi karyanishamiryango bwa apartheid". Akiri muto, Gwangwa yarakunzwe cane n'abakunzi biwe bari barwiriye mu karere ka Sophiatown kari nk'icicaro c'imico y'abirabure mu gisagara ca Johannesburg, gushika aho reta karyanishamiryango ya apartheid  isohoreye itegeko ko kizira ko abirabure bakoranira hamwe, maze ica itangura kubuza ibiteramo vya jazz, hari mu 1960. Ari kumwe n'ibindi bihangange  vya Afrika y'Epfo mu muziki, nka Masekela, Abdullah Ibrahim na Miriam Makeba, Gwangwa yahisemwo guhunga hagupfukamira igikenye ca apartheid. Yatanguye kumenyekana cane kw'isi mu 1965 mu giteramo citiriwe Ijwi rya Afrika (Sound of Africa) i New york ari kumwe n'abandi nka Makeba, Masekela, na Letta Mbulu. Cabaye intango y'igikorwa mpuzamakungu yakoresheje mu rugamba rwo kurwanya ubutegetsi bw'inkehwa z'abazungu rwaguma rutera intambwe uko bukeye uko bwije. Mu 1987, ari kumwe n'umwanditsi w'umuziki w'umwongereza George Fenton, Gwangwa yanditse amajambo y'umuziki w'ireresi yitwa Cry Freedom, ivyatumye ahabwa agashimwe kitiriwe Oscar incuro zibiri. Yararonse kandi n'ubushimwe butari buke muri Afrika y'Epfo. Yashinguranywe iteka ejo ku wa gatanu mu birori vyerekanywe ikibiriraho ku rubuga ngurukanabumenyi rw'iradiyo y'igihugu, bikaba vyashoboye guhuza abataherukana kubera ingingo za coronavirus zo kwitaramura. Urupfu rwa Gwangwa  rubaye inyuma y'indwi zibiri gusa inyuma y'urwo umugore wiwie Violet, rukaba rufatwa nk' uruhombo runini ku muziki wa Afrika y'Epfo.

column2: Burundi: Uko Gynette Kamwemwe abasha gukina imikino itatu mu mirwi yo mu gice ca mbere
column3: Inkuru ya Marc NIYONKURU Gynette Kamwemwe batazira Ngorore akina mu mirwi yo mu gice ca mbere mu mikino ya Football, Volleyball na Basketball, eka akanaba mu mirwi nserukiragihugu. Bakeya cane nibo bashobora ivyo nk'uko umumenyereza abivuga. Gynette w'imyaka 20 gusa, ni kizigenza w'umurwi w'umupira w'amaguru Faufila-PF, ni umusatirizi mu muri Aigre noir ya Volleyball, akaba n'icegera ca kizigenza mu murwi wa Basketaball wa Muzinga. Avuga ko akiri muto yatanguye gukina umupira abonye wose. Umumenyereza amuzi avuga ko bidasanzwe kubona abakinyi nk'uyu, bashobora no kubifatikanya n'amashure. 'Ngorore' ukunda cane umupira w'amaguru, yishimira cane ko yamaze kuduza ibendera ry'u Burundi mu makungu, kandi ngw'arakeneye gushika kure kuruta. Mu 2013, mu ihiganwa mpuzamakungu rya Volley beach, umurwi nserukiragihugu w'u Burundi yarimwo wararonse ikibanza ca kabiri. Gynette ariko ubu yabaye ahagaritse amahiganwa muri Basketaball kubera "utubazo duto duto turi mu gisata kijejwe amahiganwa ku rwego rw'igihgu" twatumye amahiganwa adindira umwaka wose. Yakuriye mu Ngagara mu mujyi wa Bujumbura aho yahora abona abasirikare bakina mu mugwi wa Muzinga. Ati: "Bahejeje gukina baca batwigisha gukina umupira". Mu nyuma niho yagiye agerageza iyindi mikino. Ati: "Ukwo mbonye umukino nagira nti 'Reka ndabe ko ntashobora uwu nawo kandi'." Gynette Kamwemwe avuga ko kubera imigenzo itorohereza rimwe na rimwe Abarundikazi ubwa mbere abavyeyi biwe batagomba ko aja gukina kuko bikeka ko vyomubuza kwiga. Avuga ko mu nyuma bamuretse kuko babona ko atunganya neza umwanya wa buri kimwe, akabasha kubikora vyose. Daniella Niyibimenya, umumenyereza mu mupira w'amaguru, avuga ko Kamwemwe afise impano yo kumenyera n'ingoga umukino uwariwo wose. Yemeza ko bidakunze kuboneka ko abigeme bakina imikino itandukanye ku rwego rukuru nka 'Ngorore'. Niyibimenya avuga ko igihambaye ku banyeshule bakina imipira itandukanye vyama bikenewe ko bakuriranwa cane kugira amahiganwa ntabasubize inyuma mu vyigwa. Ashima ko Gynette Kamwemwe yisigura neza muri kaminuza yigamwo.

column2: Colombia: kajugujugu y'umukuru w'igihugu Iván Duque yatewe amasasu
column3: Kajugujugu yari ireruye umukuru w'igihugu ca Colombia yatewe amasasu igihe yariko izunguruka hafi y'urubibe ico gihugu gihana na Venezuela. Perezida Iván Duque yariko azunguruka mu karere ka  Cúcuta kari mu ntara ya Norte de Santander, ari kumwe n'umushikiranganji wo kwivuna abansi, uw'intwaro yo hagati, hamwe na buramatari w'iyo ntara. Umuvugizi w'ibiro vy'umukuru w'igihugu avuga ko ata n'umwe yahasize ubuzima canke yakomeretse. Perezida Duque ariyamiriza ico yita "igitero c'ubuhemu", anavuga ko ata bwoba atewe "n'ibi bikorwa bibi vy'iterabwoba". Mw'ireresi yacishije ku rubuga rwa Twitter, yavuze ati: "Igihugu cacu kirakomeye kandi Colombia irafise inguvu zihagije zo guhangana n'iterabwoba nk'iri". Yongerako y'uko inzego z'umutekano zahawe itegeko ryo guhiga abakoze iki gitero. Ikinyamakuru co muri ico gihugu Semana, candika ko abari muri iyo ndege bumvise ikintu gikubita imoteri y'iyo kajugujugu igihe yariko irururuka. Umuhari Armée de libération nationale/National Liberation Army (ELN) uzwi ko ari wo usanzwe urwanira mu karere ka Catatumbo kari ku rubibe Colombia ihana na Venezuela. Uyu muhari ELN washinzwe mu 1964 mu ntumbero yo kurwanya ubusumbane buri mw'isaranganya ry'ubutaka n'ubutunzi bw'ico gihugu umutungo, niho muhari w'inyeshamba ukomeye muri ico gihugu. Colombia, Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika hamwe n'Ubumwe bw'ibihugu vya Buraya bifata ELN  nk'umuhari w'iterabwoba. Mu ntango z'uku kwezi, ELN yariyamirije amakuru yavuga ko ari yo yakoze igitero c'ubwiyahuzi hakoreshejwe ibibombe bitezwe mu modoka kw'ikambi ya gisirikare iri ahitwa Cúcuta. Ico gitero cakomerekeyemwo abantu 36, harimwo n'abahanuzi ba gisirikare b'abanyamerika.

column2: Gloria Estefan avuga ko yakorewe ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina afise imyaka icenda
column3: Umuririmvyi Gloria Estefan yanyeguruye ko yahohotewe bishingiye ku gitsina n'umuntu wo mu muryango igihe yari afise imyaka icenda. Uwo muririmvyi w'amamamuko ya Cuba na Amerika  w'imyaka 64 avuga ko yashurashujwe ari kw'ishure ry'umuziki n'umuntu nyina yizera. Yavuze ko "93% y'abana  bahohoterwa bazi kandi baba bizeye ababibakorera. Kandi ivyo ndabizi kuko nari umwe muri abo." Yavuze kuri iryo hohoterwa ubwa mbere mu kiganiro co kuri Facebook Watch  ari kumwe n'umukobwa wiwe akuze n'umukobwa w'uwo bavukana. Clare Crawley azwi mu biganiro vyo kuri television nawe nyene yagaragaye mu kiganiro Red Table Talk: The Estefans, nawe avuga ingene yashurashujwe n'umupatiri. Madame Crawley yavuze ko yashurashujwe "n'umujenama'' igihe yiga kw'ishure rya Katolika. Madame Estefan yamubwiye ati: "Nashaka kuvuga iki kibazo kuko birakenewe cane ko cokwirindwa. Kandi sinashaka kwicara ngaha ataco mvuze nawe uriko uratubwira ivyagushikiye kandi mu butwari". Madame Estafan yaririmvye indirimbo zizwi cane nka Conga na Rythm is Gonna Get You, yavugiye muri ico kiganiro ko incuti itari iya hafi yafatiye ku kwizerwa nyina yari ayifitiye kugira imushurashuze. Umukobwa w'uwo bavukana, Lili, w'imyaka 54 yaciye yishura uwo muririmvyi ati: "Waindiriye  uwu mwanya igihe kirekire". Yavuze ati: "Yari incuti, ariko atari iya hafi. Yari afise ububasha kuko mama yari yanshize mw'ishure ryiwe ry'umuziki aca atangura kumubwira buno nyene ingene nari mfise impano nyinshi n'uko nari nkeneye kwitabwaho bidasanzwe, nca ntangura kwumva ingene yari amahirwe kubona anyitaho gutyo." Madame Estafan , yavukiye muri Cuba hanyuma akimukira Miami n'umuryango wiwe akiri umwana w'igitambambuga, yavuze ko iryo hohoterwa ryatanguye  "buke buke hanyuma birihuta". 'Igihe kibangamye' Uwo muririmvyi amaze gutwara agashimwe ka Grammy Award gatatu yavuze ko yabona ko ari "mu gihe "kibangamye" ariko atashobora kwishitura uwo mugabo. "Naramubwiye, 'Ibi ntibibaho, ntushubora gukora ibintu nk'ibi.' Nawe agaca avuga: 'So ari muri Vietnam, nyoko ari wenyene kandi nzoca ndamwica hamwe womubwira." "Nari inzi ko uwo mugabo ari igipfu nico gituma nibaza ko vy'ukuri yashobora kugirira nabi mama." Yavuze ko ayo maganya yatumye atakaza ibice vy'umushatsi , ariko araruha arabwira nyina ivyariko biraba. N'ubwo nyima yabibwiye igiporisi, yagiriwe inama yo kudashingisha urubanza kuko yari "kurushirizaho guhahamurwa no kuja guhagarara  imbere ya sentare kuvuga ivyamushikiye".

column2: Kardinali Burke anegura Papa Francis ku vyo aherutse gushikiriza ku bubakana basangiye ibitsina
column3: Umwe mu bategetsi bakomeye ba Ekleziya Gatolika aranegura amajambo Papa Francis aherutse gushikiriza ku vyerekeye abakundanye basangiye igitsina, akavuga ko ari ivyiyumviro vyiwe bwite bidashobora gukurikizwa n'Abagatolika. Kardinali Raymond Burke abonwa na benshi ko atava kw'izima ku mico ya Ekleziya Gatolika yavuze ibi mw'ijambo yashikirije haciye umunsi umwe Papa yerekanywe ariko ashigikira ko abubakanye basangiye ibitsina bokwemerwa n'amategeko. Yari amajambo atari bwaje ku mugaragaro. Ku wa gatatu w'ino ndwi, niho Papa Francis yumvikanye ashikiriza ayo majambo. Bivanye n'aho umuntu ahagaze muri Ekleziya, Kardinali Burke ni ihwa kuri Papa, canke naho umwe muri bake bazovugisha ukuri ku butegetsi. Kurwanya Papa ku bijanye no gushigikira ko abubakanye basangiye igitsina bemerwa imbere y'amategeko ni ibintu bidatangaje, ariko amajambo yabivuzemwo niyo kumbure yotangaza. Mu gihe Raymond Burke avuga ko amajambo ya Papa Francis ari "iciyumviro ciwe bwite", yongera ko y'uko abagatolika badategetswe kwumvira uyu mukuru wa Ekleziya kuri iki kibazo, ariko ko abayobozi ba Ekleziya basanzwe bafise igikorwa co gukora ico yise 'gutanga umuco ukenewe'. Arongera agashimangira y'uko ibikorwa vy'abahuje ibitsina babisangiye 'biteye kubiri n'imico' ishingiye ku kwemera kwa Gatolika, akavuga ko amajambo yavuzwe na Papa adahuye n'inyigisho za Ekleziya kandi ko ziteye umubabaro. Mw'ireresi ivuga ku buzima n'ibikorwa vyiwe, Papa Francis yumvikanye ashigikira ko abubakanye basangiye igitsina bakwiye kwemerwa imbere y'amategeko. Ati: "Ni abana b'Imana kandi bafise uburenganzira bwo kugira umuryango. Nta n'umwe akwiye gutabwa canke ngo agirirwe nabi kubera ico. "Ico tugomba gushiraho ni itegeko ribaha uburenganzira bwo kubana. Gutyo bakaba bakingiwe n'amategeko". Mu nyigisho za Gatolika, imibonano mpuzabitsina hagati y'abasangiye igitsina ifatwa 'nk'ukugoka'. Aya majambo yavuzwe na Papa yateye impari, aho hari bamwe bashigikiye ivyo yavuze, abandi nabo babirwanya cane. Gusa impungenge zibandanya zibonekeza ni ingaruka aya majambo ashobora kugira ufatiye aho Ekleziya Gatolika ihagaze kuri iki kibazo. Massimo Faggioli, umuhinga mu vyigwa bijanye n'ivy'Imana akaba n'umwanditsi w'igitabo Pope Francis: Tradition, yabwiye BBC ati: "Nta gushidikanya ko ivyo Francis yavuze ari ikintu gishasha muri Ekleziya. Hagati aho, ni ikibazo yagiye agarukako cane kuva muri ino myaka mike iheze".

column2: Sharia: kubera iki iri tegeko rya Islam ribuza umuzik? Haruna Nkunduwiga arasigura
column3: Inyuma y’aho aba Taliban bafatiye ubutegetsi muri Afghanistan, ikintu ca mbere batangaje ni uko iki gihugu gitegerezwa kugendera kw’itegeko rya Islam, rizwi nka Sharia. Muri iri tegeko, hari vyinshi bibujijwe, kimwe muri vyo ni  umuziki. Mu ndwi iheze, umuvugizi w’aba Taliban Zabihulah Mujahid yabwiye ikinyamakuru New York Times ko umuziki ubujijwe mw’idini rya Islam. Mu gihe c’ubutegetsi  bw'aba Talibani mu myaka ya 1990, umuziki hafi ya wose, televiziyo n'amazu ya sinema vyari bibujijwe kandi kubirengako vyashoboraga kugira ingaruka zikomeye. Iri tegeko Sharia ririmwo ibifatwa nk’indenzarugero. BBC yashatse kumenya ico iri tegeko rivuga n’uko Islam ifata umuziki muri rusangi, ikaba yavuganye na Haruna Nkunduwiga yigeze kurongora umuryango w’aba-Islam mu Burundi. Haruna Nkunduwiga avuga ko iri tegeko ari itegeko ngenderwako rikunze gukurikizwa mu bihugu vya Islam, ariko ridakoreshwa mu bindi bihugu nk’Uburundi kubera Islam iri kumwe n’ayandi madini. Fyonda aho hejuru wumvirize ingene Haruna Nkunduwiga avuga.

column2: Uganda irarondera abashitse hafi y'umugore adandaza ifi yishwe na Ebola
column3: Abategetsi ba Uganda bariko bararondera abantu boba barakoze ku mugore yerekanye ibimenyetso vya Ebola mu ndwi iheze, imbere yuko apfira mu karere ka Beni muri Republika ya Demokrasi ya Kongo. Uyo mukenyezi azwi nk'umudandaza w'ifi, nk'uko bivugwa n'abayobozi ba disctrict mu gisata c'amagara y'abantu,  yarayozwe (kuruka) ari kw'isoko rya Mpondwe ku rubibe rwa Uganda na Kongo ku munsi wa kane uheze,  imbere yo gusubizwa muri Kongo agahava yicwa n'ikiza ca Ebola. Bivugwa ko yajabutse muri Uganda ava muri Kongo aciye ku rubibe rutemewe n'amategeko. Ishirahamwe rijejwe amagara kw'isi, OMS, hamwe n'ubushikiranganji bwa Uganda bujejwe amagara y'abantu vyemeje ko uyo mukenyezi yadandaza ifi yishwe n'umugera wa Ebola. Abantu bacuruza  ifi baharugwa hafi amajana atandatu hamwe n'abavunjayi bo kw'isoko rya Mpondwe bariko bararonderwa kugira bahabwe urukingo. Mu kwezi kwa gatandatu, hari abantu babiri bishwe n'ingwara ya Ebola ku rubibe rwo mu burengero bwa  Uganda na Kongo. Kuva ico gihe, nta muntu n'umwe afise umugera wa Ebola arasubira kuvugwa muri Uganda. Kubona uyu muntu yahitanywe na Ebola vyateje impungengenge kw'ikwiragira ry'ikiza ca Ebola muri Uganda ariko abayobozi bo hasi barahumuriza abavuga ko batazokwegera isoko riri ku mupaka. Abantu barenga 6.000, benshi muribo bagizwe n'abakozi bo mu gisata c'amagara y'abantu, baracandazwe umugera wa Ebola muri Uganda kuva mu kwezi kwa cumi na rimwe mu 2018. Kuva ikiza ca Ebola gitanguye kuvugwa muri Kongo, abantu barenga 2000 baravuzwe ko banduye uyo mugera, kandi wahitanye abarenga 1500.

column2: Icegeranyo ku rwego rw'isi kivuga yuko amamiriyoni y'abantu bicwa n'ubwandu budakorwako n'imiti
column3: Mu 2019, abantu barenga umuliyoni n'ibihumbi 200 bahitanywe n'ubwandu buterwa n'udukoko twa bacterie tutagikorwako n'imiti ya antibiotics, nk'uko biri mu cigwa kinini kimaze gukorwa gushika ubu. Abo bantu barenze abahitanwa na malaria canke SIDA ku mwaka. Icegeranyo kivuga yuko ibihugu bikenye ari vyo vyakozweko gusumvya, ngo ariko ikibazo c'udukoko turinda imiti gihanze amagara ya buri wese. Kwongera ubu bwa vuba amafaranga mu guhingura imiti mishasha hamwe no gukoresha iyihasanzweho mu buryo bubereye, nivyo bihanurwa gukorwa kugira twese twikingire. Gukoresha ku buryo bw'umurengera imiti ya antibiotics muri iyi myaka ya vuba mu kuvura ubwandu buto vyatumye iyo miti ata kamaro igira ku bwandu bukomeye. Abantu bariko barahitanwa n'ubwandu busanzwe bwahora buvurwa, bitewe n'uko udukoko tubutera twashitse aho turinda iyo miti. Abajejwe ivy'amagara mu Bwongereza baheruka gugabisha yuko ikibazo c'udukoko turinda imiti (antimicrobial resistance [AMR]) ari ikiza cinyegeje gishobora kuzokwiserura nyuma ya Covid-19, kiretse imiti ya antibiotic itanzwe mu buryo bubereye. Ingereranyo y'abahitanywe na AMR kw'isi, yatangajwe mu kinyamakuru the Lancet, yafatiye ku mwihwezo wavuye mu bihugu 204 wakozwe n'abashakashatsi mpuzamakungu, barongowe na Kamunuza ya Washington muri Amerika. Baharuye ko abantu bashika imiriyon zitanu bapfuye mu 2019 bahitanywe n'indwara AMR yagizemwo uruhara - bakiyongera ku muriyoni 1,2 y'impfu zatewe na AMR ubwayo. Uyo mwaka nyene, bivugwa ko SIDA yahitanye abantu 860.000, malariya nayo 640.000. Benshi mu bapfuye kubera AMR bahitanywe n'ubwandu bw'imbere mw'ihemero, nk'umusonga, hamwe n'ubwandu bw'imihora y'amaraso, ishobora gutuma umuntu agira umuriro w'umurengera (septic). Ikindi kibazo kizwi nka MRSA (methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus) carahitanye benshi kurusha, mu gihe agakoko wa E. coli, hamwe n'utundi dukoko twinshi, natwo twagize uruha mu kurinda imiti kwa cane. Hifashishijwe amakuru yakuwe ku barwayi abitswe mu bitaro, ivyigwa hamwe n'ayandi masoko y'amakuru, abashakasha bavuga yuko abana ari bo babangamiwe cane, mu gihe urupfu rumwe muri zitanu zitewe na AMR rushika mu bana bari munsi y'imyaka itanu. Impfu zitewe na AMR zigereranywa ko ari: Deaths from AMR were estimated to be: Impfu zivuye kudakora kwa antibiotic vyari vyitezwe kuba: Prof Chris Murray, wo mu kigo kijejwe ibiharuro mu vy'amagara n'ubugenduzi kuri Kaminuza ya Washington, yavuze ko ibiharuro bishasha vyerekana isura y'ukuri y'ikibazo c'udukoko turinda imiti kw'isi kandi ko ari imburi yuko hakwiye kugira igikorwa vuba "nitwaba dushaka gutsinda urugamba rw'udukoko turinda imiti". Abandi bahinga bavuga ko gukurikrana urugero rw'ukurinda imiti mu bihugu bitandukanye n'uturere ari nkenerwa. Muganga Ramanan Laxminarayan, wo mu kigo Centre for Disease Dynamics, Economics and Policy, i Washington, yavuze ko amahera atangwa ku rwego rw'isi yo guhangana n'ikibazo ca AMR akeneye kwongerwa gushika ku rugero rw'ayakoreshwa ku zindi ndwara. Yagize ati "Ubwa mbere na mbere amahera akwiye gushirwa mu gukinga ubwandu, hakarabwa ko antibiotic zihari zikoreshwa neza kandi mu buryo bubereye, hamwe no gushira ku masoko antibiotics nshasha". Muganga Laxminarayan yongeye ati henshi kw'isi hari ikibazo co kubona imiti ya antibiotic izimbutse kanyi ivura neza - kandi ivyo bikwiye gufatwa nkama n'abarongozi mu vy'amagara hamwe n'abanyepolitike aho ari ho hose.

column2: Mesut Ozil avuga ko azoguma muri Arsenal gushika amasezerano arangiye mu 2021
column3: Mesut Ozil, umukinyi wo hagati w'umurwi Arsenal, avuga ko azoguma muri uyo murwi "gushika ku munota wa nyuma" w'amasezerano yiwe ategekanijwe kurangira mu kwa gatandatu 2021. Kuva inkino za Premier League zisubiriye gutangura mu kwa gatandatu, uyo mukinyi w'imyaka 31 ubu - yigeze kuba ari mpuzamakungu w'Ubudagi -  ntiyigeze akinishwa n'umumenyereza Mikel Arteta, avuga ko ari ukubera "ibibazo bijanye n'urukino". Amasezerano afitaniye na Arsenal amuha umushahara w'amapawundi 350.000 ( amadorari y'abanyamerika 458,421) ku ndwi. Ozil yahakanye amakuru avuga ko uyu murwi woba uriko urondera kumwishura umushahara wose w'umwaka umwe asigaje muri ayo masezerano. Yabwiye ikinyamakuru Athletic ati: "Nivyo ibintu vyaragoranye ariko ndakunda Arsenal. Nije nzohitamwo igihe nzogira, si abandi bantu bampitiramwo umunsi wo kugenda". Yongerako ati: "Nzokwitangira umurwi uko nshoboye kwose. Ibintu nk'ibi ntaco bizongira, ahubwo bimpa ingoga. Muri kahise narashoboye kwerekana ko nshobora kwivyukiranya kandi nzosubira ndavyerekane". Ozil, umukinyi yinjiye muri Arsenal mu 2013 aguzwe muri Real Madrid ku mapawundi imiliyoni 42.4, yaramaze igihe adakina igihe uyu murwi wamenyerezwa na Unai Emery, mu nyuma arasubira mu kibuga igihe wamenyerezwa vy'imfatakibanza na Freddie Ljungberg. Igihe Arteta afatiye ibintu mu minwe mu kwa 12 kw'umwaka uheze, Ozil yarakinishijwe mu nkino zose cumi za Premier League Arsenal yakinye imbere y'uko iri higanwa rihagarikwa vy'agateganyo mu kiringo c'amezi atatu kubera coronavirus kuva mu kwa gatatu. Hagati aho, mu nkino zose 13 za Arsenal ihiganwa risubiye kwugururwa, Ozil ntiyigeze akinishwa na rimwe. Mu kwa kane Arteta n'abakinyi biwe baremeye ko bakatwa ibice 12.5%, maze Arsenal nayo itangaza ko itegura guhagarika abakozi bayo 55 kubera ibibazo vy'amafaranga vyavuye ku kiza karanda ca coronavirus. Hagati aho, Ozil wewe ntiyemeye ko umushahara wiwe ugabanywa, akavuga ko abakinyi "bafashwe gihutihuti". Amenyesha ko iyo ngingo ishobora kuba ari yo yatumye ataronswa amahirwe yo kwinjira mu kibuga. N'aho yubaha ingingo ya Arteta yo kutamukinisha, Ozil abona ko yari kuba yarahawe akaryo ko kwerekana ivyo ashoboye mu kibuga. Ati: "Urashobora kudakina mu nkino cumi zose zikurikirana kubera urwaye, ariko atari kubera ko utabishoboye canke kubera ufise ingeso mbi". Avuga kandi ko atari we wenyene yanse gukatwa umushahara, ariko ko izina ryiwe ari ryo ryabonetse gusumba.

column2: Uwagandaguye John Lennon yasavye imbabazi ku 'caha c’agahomerabunwa' yakoze haciye imyaka 40
column3: Mark Chapman, umugabo yishe John Lennon, yasavye imbabazi umupfakazi, Yoko Ono w'imyaka 40, yasizwe n'uyu yahoze ari muririmvyi rurangiranwa, inyuma y'imyaka 40 apfuye. Uyu mucuraranzi w'umwongereza John Lennon azwi ko yashinze umurwi w'abanyamuziki Beatles wabikoze bigacika kuva utangujwe mu ntango za 1960. Chapman yarashe Lennon amasasu ane amusanze hanze y'inzu yabamwo mu karere ka Manhattan mu gisagara ca New York, amurasira mu maso y'umugore wiwe Ono, hari mu 1980. Yarankiwe kurekurwa vy'agateganyo igihe yari arengukishijwe ku ncuro ya cumi na rimwe mu kwezi guheze. Igihe yariko arumvirizwa, Chapman yavuze ko yishe uyu munyamuziki rurangiranwa wo mu bwoko bwa rock arondera gusa icubahiro, akavuga ko mu bisanzwe yari akwiye igihano c'urupfu. Yongera ko y'uko igihe cose aguma yicuza iki "caha c'agahomerabunwa", akemera ko ashobora kumara ubuzima bwiwe mw'ibohero. Ari imbere y'abacamanza i New York, Chapman yavuze ati: "N'ukuri nongeye gusaba imbabazi kuri iki caha". "Nta citwazo na kimwe mfise. Ibi vyari ivyo kwihesha agaciro. Nibaza ko iki ari icaha kitagira urugero gishobora gukorerwa umuntu w'intungane". "Yari rurangiranwa. Ntabwo namwishe kubera imico yiwe canke uko yari ameze. Yari umugabo w'intungane afise umuryango. Yari umuntu w'akarorero. Yari umuntu yavuga ibintu turiko turavuga ubu kandi ni ikintu gikomeye". "Nkoresheje amajambo yanyu, naramwishe, kubera yari umuntu azwi cane, cane, cane rwose, nico cabintumye, kandi nabikoze nshaka cane, cane, cane rwose icubahiro, ukwikunda birengeje". "Ndashaka kongerako iki kintu, kandi ndagishimangire cane. Narakoze icaha c'ukwikunda. Ndababajwe n'umubabaro nateye umugore wiwe Ono. Ni ikintu kitarigera kimva mu mutwe". Abandanya avuga ko mu bisanzwe yari akwiye igihano c'urupfu - igihano cagiye gukurwaho mu ntara ya New York mu 2007 - n'aho ata wari bwigere anyongwa kuva mu 1963. Ati: "Iyo uzi neza ko uriko utegura umugambi wo kwica umuntu ukamenya ko ari bibi kandi ukabikora wewe nyene ubwawe, kubwanje ico ni igihano c'urupfu". Abajijwe nimba ubutungane bwakoze neza, Champan yishuye ati: "Eka ntaco maze, ntaco". "Mu gihe amategeko hamwe na mwebwe mwofata ingingo yo kungumiza hano mu minsi nsigaje kubaho, si noja ng'aho ngo ndiko ndaharira n'ukuri". Mu 2015, uyu munyatugenegene Yoko Ono akomoka mu Buyapani, akaba yagumye arwanya Chapman igihe cose yarondera ko yorekurwa vy'agateganyo, yabwiye ikinyamakuru Daily Beast co ku ngurukanabumenyi ko yumva ubwoba bwinshi cane mu gihe Chapman yorekurwa. Ati: "Ico nguma niyumvira ni uko yabikoze rimwe, ariko kandi ashobora gusubira kubikorera uwundi muntu - ico ni ukukimenya. Ashobora kubikorera jewe, canke Sean [umwana wiwe], eka ashobora kubikorera uwo ari we wese, rero iyi niyo ngorane". Impapuro z'urubanza zashitse mu minwe y'ishirahamwe ry'ibinyamakuru Press Association zerekana ko abacamanza banse ko Chapman arekurwa, bavuga ko "bishobora guhungabanya umutekano w'abanyagihugu". Igihe akora iki caha, Chapman yari afise imyaka 25. Ubu afise 65, yararongoye umugore wiwe akaba aba hafi y'aho amaze imyaka umunani apfungiwe. Mu nama y'abacamanza bariko bariga nimba yari akwiye kurekurwa vy'agateganyo, Chapman yasiguwe nk'umuntu asigaye yarihebeye cane Imana kandi ko ari "umukirisu akomeye". Urubanza rwo kwiga nimba ashobora kurekurwa vy'agateganyo ruzosubira mu kiringo c'imyaka ibiri.

column2: Ukraine: ikivuko ca Odesa catewe amabombe inyuma y’amasaha make habaye amasezerano
column3: Ibibombe vyanyiganyije ikivuko gikomeye ca Ukraine inyuma y’umusi umwe gusa Kyiv na Moscou bashitse ku masezerano yotumye intete za Ukraine zisubira gushorwa hanze. Ibisasu bibiri vya misire vyatewe mu gisagara ca Odesa gifise ikivuko mu masaha yo mu gaturuturu ko kuri uno wa gatandatu, nk’uko igisirikare ca Ukraine kibimenyesha. Nk’uko biri muri ano masezerano yaraye ashitsweko, Uburusiya bwemeye kudatera ibivuko bizoba bifise intete ziriko zishorwa hanze. Ishirahamwe ONU  rivuga ko ano masezerano ari “ikimenyetso c’umwizero” inyuma y’intambara imaze amezi. Mu butumwa bwacishijwe ku mbuga hwaniro, ibiro vya gisirikare mu bumanuko bwa Ukraine bivuga ko ibisasu bibiri vya misire zo mu bwoko bwa Kalibr vyaguye kuri iki kivuko, mu gihe ibindi bibiri navyo vyakorowe n’igisata kirwanira mu kirere. Oleksiy Honcharenko, umushingamateka w’akarere, yanditse kuri Telegram ko iki gitero catumye haduka umuriro mu kivuko c’iki gisagara. "Iyi mihimbiri itera igikumu ku masezerano n’ukuboko kumwe mu gihe ukundi nako gutera misire”, niko Honcharenko yanditse. "Nico gituma dukeneye indege kugira ngo dusenyure amato y’intambara yose y’Uburusiya ari mu Nyanja yirabura. Iyi ni yo nzira yonyene yo gushobora gushora hanze intete”. Ntibiramenyekana neza nimba hari abapfuye n’abakomeretse, canke nimba hari ibintu vyononekaye. Ejo ku wa gatanu, abategetsi ba Kyiv na Moscou barateye igikumu ku masezerano yotumye imiriyoni n’imiriyoni z’amatoni y’intete zugaraniwe muri Ukraine zishobora gushorwa hanze. Nk’uko bivugwa n’abaserukizi b’ibihugu, bimwe mu vyo bemeranije ni uko Uburusiya budatera ibivuko mu gihe bizoba biriko birasohora ibidandazwa hanyuma Ukraine nayo ikaba yemeye guherekeza imizigo mu mazi yuzuye ama mines. Aya masezerano – akaba yafashe amezi abiri kugira ashikweko – yiteze kubandanya mu kiringo c’imisi 120, akazoba ahagarariwe kandi akurikiranirwa hagufi n’ibiro bizoshingwa i Istanbul muri Turukiya, bikazoreramwo abategetsi ba ONU, Turukiya, Ukraine n’ab’Uburusiya. Arashobora kwongerezwa ikiringo mu gihe impande zompi zovyumvikanako. Andriy Yermak, umukuru w’ibiro vy’umukuru w’igihugu Volodymyr Zelensky, ariyamiriza iki gitero akagiriza Uburusiya ko “bubandanya buteza ikibazo c’imfungurwa”. Umuvugizi w’ubushikiranganji bwa Ukraine bujejwe imigenderanire, Oleh Nikolenko yongeyeko ati: "Iyi misire y’Uburusiya ni amate Vladimir Putin aciriye ku munyamabanga mukuru w’ishirahamwe ONU, António Guterres no kuri Perezida Recep Erdogan wa Turukiya, bitanze uko bashoboye kwose habe aya masezerano, mbere Ukraine ikaba ibashimira cane”. Iki gitero kibaye mu gihe abategetsi bo mu bushikiranganji bwo kwivuna abansi bw’Ubwongereza bavuga ko ingabo z’Uburusiya mu ntara ya Kherson zishobora kubura ingene zironswa ivya nkenerwa kubera amayira ashobora gukatwa n’ingabo za Ukraine. Kyiv yaratanguje igitero gikomeye co kwivuna mu bumanuko bw’igihugu, kandi ingabo zayo zarakoresheje inkoho zirasa kure ibisasu vya misire zatanzwe na Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika  mu gutera ikiraro ca Antonovsky i Kherson. Mu gihe iki kiraro cobomorwa, Uburusiya ntibwokworoherwa gushikira ingabo zabwo.

column2: Burundi - Ingoma: Reta yahagaritse abavuzi b'ingama b'umugwi Amagaba mu kiringo c'amezi atandatu
column3: Ubushikiranganji bujejwe akarere ka Afrika y'ubuseruko, urwaruka, inkino hamwe n'akaranga bwahagaritse abatimbo b'umugwo Amagaba ikiringo c'amezi atandatu bagirizwa kuvuza ingoma bahonyanze amategeko azigenga. Abo bavuzi b'ingama canke abatimbo bagirizwa kurenga kw'itegeko ryo ku wa 20 ukwezi kwa cumi mu 2017 rigena uko ingoma zivuzwa haba mu Burundi canke mu makungu. Mu ngingo y'ubwo bushikiranganji bugira buti: "Twishimikije ko dutegerezwa kugikingira no kubungabunga akaranga k'Uburundi, duhagaritse mu kiringo c'amezi atandatu abavuzi b'ingoma  bo mu mugwi Amagaba mu kiringo c'amezi atandatu. "Abo batimbo bavugije bongera batamba ingoma bahonyanze akaranga k'abarundi." Muri ico kiringo, nta muntu n'umwe wo mri abo batumbo azoba afise uburenganzira bwo kuja mu biteramo vy'akaranga canke kuja mu wundi mugwi canke abantu berekana akaranga k'abarundi. Ku musi wa mbere itariki 7 z'ukwezi kwa kabiri mu 2022, igihe hariko harugururwa igiteramo ca Buja Sans Tabou, abavuzi b'ingoma b'wumugwi Amagaba bagaragaye bavuza ingoma bambaye amakoti n'amakaruvati. Iyo nyifato ikaba yarateye impari ku mbuga hwaniro, aho bamwe babitera ivyatsi abandi bavuga ko ari ibisanzwe kuko imico igenda ihindagurika uko imisi igenda irahera. Mw'itangazo Amagaba yasohoye itangazo aho bavuga ko bakiriye nkama ibihano bafatiwe. Bagira bati: "Kubwo abatimbo b'Amagaba, turakiriye nkana igihano ubushikiranganji bwadufatiye kw'ikosa ryadushikiye ryanatirimukije abatari bake n'aho atari yo ntumbero yacu." Inyuma y'umusi umwe igiteramo Buja Sans Tabou gitanguye, ubushikiranganji bujejwe akarere ka Afrika y'ubuseruko, inkino hamwe n'akaranga bwaciye bufata ingingo yo kugihagarika kubera ivyo vyabaye.

column2: Imvo n'Imvano ku musi mukuru wa Noheli abakristu kw'isi bibuka ivuka ry'umwana Yezu/Yesu
column3: Ndabaramukije nongera ndabaha n'ikaze mu kiganiro c'Imvo n'Imvano co kuri uyu wa gatandatu igenekerezo rya 25 ukwezi kwa 12 mu 2021. Imvo n'Imvano y'uyu musi yerekeye umusi mukuru wa Noheli, aho abakristu hirya no hino kw'isi bibuka ivuka ry'umwana Yezu/Yesu. Buri mwaka, abemera Kristu imiliyoni n'imiliyoni hirya no hino kw'isi barahimbaza umusi mukuru wa Noheli. Noheli y'uyu mwaka, ibaye mu gihe ikiza Covid kibandanya kuvugwa mu bihugu bitandukanye kw'isi no mu gihe haherutse kugaragara ubundi bwoko bita Omicron bwandukira ku buryo bwihuta. Muri kino kiganiro, twahisemo guha umwanya abakunzi b'Imvo n'Imvano bifuje kutubwira uko bariko barahimbaza umusi mukuru wa Noheli, ari na ko tugenda tubashikiriza uturirimbo dutandukanye two guhimbaza uyu musi. None Noheli yiteguriwe gute muri iyi misi ikiza coronavirus cakwiragiye kw'isi? Ababa mu karere k'ibiyaga binini n'abari mu bindi bihugu eka mbere n'abari mu makambi y'impunzi bariko bayihimbaza gute? Inyishu ni muri kino kiganiro. Mugiye kuba hamwe na Cyriaque Muhawenayo, muri studios za BBC i Nairobi.

column2: Ivanguraruhu: BBC yavuganye n'umwe mu batyoje Bukayo Saka, ati 'ndasaba imbabazi'
column3: Ikiganiro ca BBC File on 4 kimaze igihe gikora amatohoza kw'ityozwa rishingiye kw'ivanguraruhu ryakorewe abakinyi b'abirabure b'Abongereza biciye ku mbuga hwaniro mu ntumbero yo kumenya ico vyavuyeko, ni inyuma y'urukino rwa nyuma rwa Euro 2020. Iki kiganiro cavuganye n'abatari bake muri aba bantu, umwe muri bo yatyoje Bukayo Saka ku mbuga hwaniro avuga ko ubu yipfuza gusaba imbabazi. Saka, Marcus Rashford na Jadon Sancho bose bahuye n'imvura y'ibitutsi vy'ivanguraruhu ku mbuga hwaniro inyuma y'aho bose bahushirije ama penalties muri urwo rukino rwa nyuma. Umwe muri aba babatyoje - umugabo ari mu myaka ya 20 akomoka muri Arabia Saoudite - yamurungikiye uducapo twinshi (emojis) tw'inkende ku rubuga rwa Instagram. Mu nyuma y'aho, konte yiwe ya Instagram yarahagaritswe mu kiringo c'amasaha 24, ariko ubu avuga ko yategerezwa guhagarikwa burundu ku mbuga hwaniro. Amaze kwerekwa ivyo yakoze, yaremeye kuvugana na File on 4. Avuga ko yari ashigikiye Ubwongereza muri urwo rukino rwa nyuma arico gituma yagize "uburakari" igihe uyu murwi utsindirwa ku mapenalties. Aremera kandi y'uko yari azi neza ko ivyo yariko arakora vyari ivanguraruhu: "Ni ikosa rikomeye. Nari narakaye kandi sinari nzi ingene Saka yari kwiyumva agiye abona inkende. Nabonye abandi bariko bararungika utwo ducapo nanje nca njako". "Ndashaka n'ukuri gusaba imbabazi Saka, ryari ikosa kandi sinzosubira kubimugirako canke kubigira ku mukinyi w'umwirabure uwo ari we wese." Uyu muntu yavuze ko konte yiwe yahagaritswe na Instagram ikiringo c'amasaha 24. Ariko avuga ko ubu yemera ko yategerezwa guhagarikwa "burundu" kubera ivyo yashize ku rubuga ari "ivanguraruhu ryeruye". Nedum Onuoha wahoze ari umukinyi w'inyuma wa Manchester City - avuga atarya umunwa ku vyerekeye umupira w'amaguru n'ivanguraruhu - ko yibaza y'uko ibivugwa n'uyu mugabo ata kintu kirimwo. Onuoha yabwiye BBC ati: "Aha avuga ngo, 'Nategerezwa guhagarikwa burundu'. Bisa n'uko abivuga kubera yibaza ko ari ko yategerezwa kuvuga". "Yagiye kuri konte ya Bukayo Saka kuri Instagram ashirako emoji y'inkende nk'iciyumviro yari ashikirije ku vyari ku rubuga kandi azi neza ko atategerezwa kubikora, ariko yabikoze kubera abandi bose bariko barabikora". "Kumbure yibaza ko bose bari barakaye nka we. Ndatahura akababaro ariko igiteye ishavu ni iyo urenze umurongo, kuko bituma abantu bakora nkawe, ibi navyo nkabona ko ari amakosa". Konte z'ivanguraruhu ziracari ku rubuga Konte y'uyu mugabo ni imwe muri 105 zamenyeshejwe na Instagram ko zacishijweko ibitabereye inyuma y'uru rukino rwa nyuma rwa Euro, ariko File on 4 yasanze 79 muri zo zikiri ku mbuga inyuma y'indwi zirenga zitandatu. Callum Hood, wo mu kigo kirwanya amajambo y'urwanko acishwa ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi, Centre for Countering Digital Hate, akaba yaranafashije gukora aya matohoza, avuga ko ivyo babonye ari uko amakompanyi akoresha imbuga hwaniro ata shaka afise yo kurandurana n'imizi ivanguraruhu ricishwa ku mbuga ngurukanabumenyi. Ati: "Instagram yo nyene ubwayo yaratangaje mu ntango z'uno mwaka ko izohagarika amakonte azorungika amajambo y'ivanguraruhu ku bakinyi, rero bariko bararenga ku vyo biyemeje". "Turiko tuvuga abantu bakoresha rya jambo ritangurwa na N (N-word) mu gutyoza abakinyi, abantu bakoresha ama emojis y'inkende, babwira abantu ngo taha iwanyu". "Imbuga hwaniro zifise ingingo zazo ngenderwako zivuga ko zidashobora kwemera ivanguraruhu, ko ivangiraruhu ridafise ikibanza ku mbuza zazo, ariko ibikorwa vyabo birerekana neza ko ataco bakora kugira ngo batorere umuti iki kibazo". Instagram ivuga ko yafuse konte zitari nke n'amajambo y'ibitutsi kuri uru rubuga kubera abarenze ku mategeko inyuma y'amatohoza yakozwe na File on 4. Istangram ivuga ko abahonyanze amategeko abuza amajambo y'urwanko bashobora kudashoka batakaza konte zabo ubwo nyene, ariko ko aya majambo aca afutwa. Ivuga kandi ko yashizeho ubuhinga butari buke buzotuma amajambo y'ibitutsi ataja ku mbuga. Igipolisi kiriko kirakora amatohoza ku majambo yo gutyoza yakurikiye uru rukino rwa nyuma kivuga ko mu butumwa 396 buriko burakorwako amatohoza, inusu muri bwo ari ubwavuye hanze, hafi bwose bukaba bwavuye hanze y'imigabane na Asia n'Ubulaya. Gushika ubu, abantu 12 nibo bamaze guhagarikwa mu Bwongereza umwe muri bo akaba amaze kuburanywa. Hampande y'ibi, ishirahamwe mpuzamakungu rijejwe umupira w'amaguru FIFA, ryatanguye kwiga ibihano bibereye vyohabwa abafana ba Hongrie inyuma y'ityozwa rishingiye ku rukoba ryakorewe abakinyi b'Abongereza igihe ico gihugu cakina n'Ubwongereza kigatsindwa 4-0 i Budapest. 'Ndababazwa n'ivyama biriko biraba' Tony Burnett, umukuru w'ishirahamwe rikuru ryishinze kurwanya ivanguraruhu, Kick It Out, abona ko imbuga hwaniro zikeneye gushiramwo inguvu gusumba kugira ngo zihashe ivanguraruhu ryakorewe abakinyi b'Abongereza muri uru rukino rwa nyuma rwa Euro2020. "Ndababazwa n'ivyama biriko biraba. Nari kuri final kandi twari tuzi neza ivyari bigiye gukurikira inyuma y'aho tunaniriwe kwinjiza arya ma penaliti". "Rero kubera twari tubizi, imbuga hwaniro zategerezwa kuba zamenye ivyari bigiye gukurikira hanyuma zigakora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo zikingire aba bahungu bateye arya ma penaliti yacu".

column2: Funke Abimbola: ‘Izina ryanje ry’ikinyafrika ryambujije kuronka akazi’
column3: Umunyamategeko akongera akaba n'umwe mu baharanira uburenganzira bw'inkehwa, Funke Abimbola,  avuga ko "yamye arenganywa" igihe cose yagerageje kurondera akazi. Hafi icagatatu c'ama kompanyi 100 adandaza imitahe (FTSE) nta nkehwa afise mu nzego zifata ingingo, nk'uko icegeranyo kibivuga. Ikigo kijejwe kwihweza ingene ubwoko buserukiwe mu ma kompanyi atandukanye, Parker Review Committee, mu gihugu c'Ubwongereza, kimenyesha ko inkehwa zidaserukiwe mu nzego zifata ingingo mu makompanyi atari make. Umupfasoni Abimbola avuga ati: "Nahuye n'inzitizi nyinshi  igihe nariko ndondera akazi kubera nari mfise izina ry'ikinyafirika, kandi kubera ndi umwirabure, nta gukekeranya". Yabwiye BBC ko yaterefonye incuro zirenga ijana kugira ngo ashobore guhonyoza ikirenge  mu kazi. Ati: "Baranyinuvye, barankarira cane gusumba abandi  kubera kwitwa umugore w'umwirabure". "Biroroshe kukubona uwo uri we kandi biroroshe cane rwose kukurenganya iyo uri mu nkehwa". Icegeranyo c'ikigo Parker Review Committee  cerekana ko mu makompanyi adandaza imitahe ashika 250 casanze inkehwa zidaserukiwe mu nzego zifata ingingo, aho 119 kuri 179 amoko adaserukiwe. Umupfasoni Abimbola avuga ati: "Ico cegeranyo ntikintangaza. Hari inzitizi nyinshi  cane kugira ngo inkehwa zishobore kuronka ikibanza mu nzego zo hejuru". Ico kigo Parker Review Committee cashinzwe kugira ngo gikore ubushakashatsi ku kungene amoko atandukanye aserukiwe mu nzego zifata ingingo  mu makompanyi atandukanye, casohoye icegeranyo caco kuri ico kibazo mu 2017. Ico gihe, mu makompanyi 51 kw'ijana adandaza imitahe inkehwa ntizari ziserukiwe mu nzego zifata ingingo, ugereranije n'ubu ari 33%. Ico cegeranyo gisaba ko gushika mu 2021 buri kompanyi mu makompanyi 100 ya FTSE yoba ifise n'imiburiburi indongozi imwe iva mu nkehwa, hanyuma gushika mu 2024 naho mu makompanyi 250 ya FTSE yoba yamaze gukora gutyo. Mu ntumbero yo gufasha kugira ngo inkehwa ziserukirwe, ico cegeranyo gisaba ko buri kompanyi yokwama itanga icegeranyo c'ingene inkehwa ziserukiwe mu nzego zifata ingingo, n'ingene ubwoko butandukanye buserukiwe. Umupfasoni Abimbola arizeye ko mu gihe hoba integuro yoha ibibanza kanaka inkehwa vyofasha mu gutorera inyishu ico kibazo. Ati: "Hariho amashirahamwe makeya mu Bwongereza aha akazi amoko atandukanye. "Ayo mashirahamwe yama ategura intonde z'abantu bafise ubuhinga butandukanye muy bwoko butandukanye buri mwaka, rero iyo wipfuza kurondera abirabure, abanyaziya hamwe n'inkehwa, biba ngombwa ko uja kuronderera muri izo ntonde". Umushikiranganji w'ubudandaji, Andrea Leadsom, avuga ko ico cegeranyo cerekana ko "amakompanyi agifise igikorwa kitari gito" kugira ngo ashobore guhimiriza abakozi b'abirabure, Abanya Aziya hamwe n'inkehwa.

column2: Eritrea ‘yigaruriye ibigo vy'ubuvuzi vyegukira katolika’
column3: Amakuru ashikira BBC igisata c'ururimi rwa Tigrinya, amenyesha ko leta y'igihugu ca Eritrea yategetse Ekleziya Katolika gushikiriza ibigo vy'ubuvuzi vyose bisanzwe vyegukira iryo dini. Mu ntango z'iyi ndwi, abategetsi basavye abarongoye ivyo bigo  gutera igikumu ku rwandiko rwemeza ko babishikirije. Ariko abarongoye ivyo bigo nka bose baranse gushira umukono kuri urwo rwandiko, basaba ahubwo ko bovugana n'abarongoye iryo shengero. Inyuma y'aho, abajejwe umutekano bategetse abakozi bavyo gusohoka, baca baravyugara. Nta wuzi igituma ubutegetsi bwa Eritrea bufashe iyo ngingo. Hagati aho, mu kwezi kwa kane uno mwaka, abasenyeri ba Ekleziya Katolika muri Eritrea barasavye ko hotanguzwa umugambi w'ukunywanisha mu gihugu, ivyotuma abanyagihugu bose batunganirwa. Mu rwandiko rw'impapuro 30 rwanditswe n'abo basenyeri inyuma y'amasezerano y'amahoro hagati y'ico gihugu na Ethiopia, bamenyesheje ko ari nkenerwa ko abanyagihugu bonywanishwa kugira ngo igihugu gikire. Basavye ubutegetsi ko bwogira impinduka zotuma abanyagihugu batipfuza guhunga igihugu.

column2: Burundi: Leta ikemura gute ikibazo c'ikena ry'amahera y'agaciro?
column3: Leta y'u Burundi iheruka gufata ingingo mu gisata c'ubutunzi n'urudandazwa benshi bavuga ko zigamije kugerageza kubungabunga amahera y'agaciro ari muri ico gihugu. Muri urwo rwego, Banki ya Republika y'u Burundi iherutse gufata itegeko riraba abinjirana amafaranga muri ico gihugu, harimwo n'abanyamahanga. Iryo tegeko ribabwiriza gukoresha amafranga y'amarundi mu kugura ibintu vyose imbere mu gihugu. Baterezwa kandi  kuvunjisha mu bigo vyemewe n'amategeko amafranga y'agaciro baba bafise, bashaka kuyakoresha. Iyo ngingo yakurikiranye n'iyindi igenga ukudandaza ubutare n'ayandi mabuye y'agaciro muri banki y'igihugu. Ikibazo c'ikena ry'amafatanga y'agaciro mu Burundi bivugwa ko coba kiva ahanini ku bihano u Burundi bwafatiwe n'ishirahamwe rya Buraya, ryahagaritse amahera ryaha ico gihugu kuva mu 2015 igihe hatangura ingorane za politike. Mu gushaka kumenya vyinshi kuri izo ngingo leta y'u Burundi iheruka gufata, Florentine Kwizera yavuganye na Faustin Ndikumana, umuhinga mu vy'ubutunzi. Ushobora kwumva ico kiganiro ngaha
